78a1(mdo): sbyor ba yang myed pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no// sems can cha mnyam pa spyod pa rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa yongs su shes pa'i sbyor ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la cha mnyam pa'i//
78a2(mdo): chad pa yang myed pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no// klu'i bdag po mdor sdu na/ spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa'i sbyor ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la sbyor ba yang myed pa gang yin pa de
78a3(mdo): gzungs 'di la sbyor ba yin no// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sbyor ba gang yin pa dang / myi sbyor ba gang yin pa'i chos gang de la spyod pa yang myed/ myi sbyor ba yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyor ba de ni snang ba yang ma yin/
78a4(mdo): brtags pa yang ma yin/ mtshan mar byas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de bas na sbyor ba de ni yang dag pa'i sbyor yin no// yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yang chos gang yang 'dren par yang myi byed/ myi 'dren par yang myi byed
78a5(mdo): 'dzind par yang myi byed/ gtong bar yang myi byed/ gnas par ya nga myi byed/ 'gro bar yang myi byed de/ de bas na sbyor ba de ni yang dag pa'i/ sbyor ba zhes bya'o// klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sbyor
78a6(mdo): ba ni myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' su lang to// gang che de'i sa gzungs 'di thob gyur na// de'i dran dang blo gros yongs
78a7(mdo): spu dag/ mdo sde rtogs pa kun gyi pha rol phyirang / 'gro ba'i skad dang sgra yang rab tu shes/ 'gro ba'i sems dang spyod pa ngan pa dang / bzang dang 'bring kyi rgyu ba gang yin shes/ spyod dang sems kyi rgyud rnams shes nas kyang
78a8(mdo): ji sngam 'tsham par chos kyi tshig rnams so dang / gang che de ni gzungs la rab sa khas na/ de ni myu dang byed dang rkyen la mkhas// rtas dang chad par lta bar myi 'gyur te/ mthar 'dzin du thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin
78a9(mdo): gang re de yis gzungs 'di thob gyur nga na/ yi ge dang ni tshig rnams 'byed la mkhas/ skad rnams mang po dum tha dang shes/ don dang yi ge dag la mkhas par 'gyur// de'i lha'i phyig kyang dri byed 'gyur/ de'i
78b1(mdo): lha'i rna ba 'ab rnam par dag/ shes rab mtha' yas pha rol sems la mkhas/ 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs bskal pa dran// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang pa thob gyur de nas// zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas skad
78b2(mdo): cig 'gro// 'jig rten 'dren rnams la ni mchod par byed/ de bzhin gzungs la thos pas chos kyang 'dzin/ bdud rnams 'bum phrag ji snyed yod pa 'as/ de'i 'gro ba'i yul rnams myi shes la/ mun bsal
78b3(mdo): sems na dag pa nyon mongs myed/ mdo sde stong phrag tshad myed ston par byed// chu'i nang na pad ma ma gos bzhin// de ni 'jig rten chos rnams gos myed spyod// rjes chags khong khro rnams las rtag tu grol/ 'jig rten
78b4(mdo): kun la sems ni mkha' ltar snyoms// mtshan gyi dam pa gzugs 'chang dag pa ste// de la lta bas skye bo chog myi shes// spyod lam dag ni spyod pa shes bzhin rgyu// 'gro la phan don byed cing 'jig rten rgyu/
78b5(mdo): gang tshe gzungs 'di thob par gyur pa na/ brgya byin de bzhin tshad sa pa 'jig rten spyod// de'i rkang mthil du ni gus par 'dud// 'on kyang de yid gar du'ang khengs pa myed// de ni skad snyan tshangs pa'i
78b6(mdo): dbyangs dang ldan// skye bo'i yid ni rnam sbyor mgu bar byed// skye na myed snyan cing dag la dus su smra// de'i bstan pa don myed yong myi 'gyu 8// gang tshe de'i gzungs ni thob gyur na// de ni 'khor gyi nang du
78b7(mdo): 'jigs pa myed// seng ge sgra chen gyi 'jigs spogs par byed/ pha rol tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can g.yonan gdus dka' ba rgyal khengs// mngon pa'i ngargyal skyon ldan gang yin pa/ de dag
78b8(mdo): mkhas pa'i chos ni thob gyur dar/ ras spangs nas rkang mthil bdud par byed// chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhinazhi ba dang // dor rtogs dang ni chos nyid nges pa pa shes/ de phyir chos ni gtan la 'bebs pa dang / ye ge 'byed
78b9(mdo): sa de'i tshig gyi zad / sems can rang ba'i ras dag chos kyi byings// de ba'id bdag nyid rnam dag de'i mashes// de kar sems par de ba'idi nyid zhes pas/ de'i chos rnams bstan pa thogs pa byed/ zad pa ram pa/
79a1(mdo): shang bar gyi nus sa// myi zad pa yang rnams kyang zar gyi 'gyur/ chos nyid rab 'i 'di ni rtogs nas kyang / der ni mdo sde bye ba mtha' yas ston / yi ge 'di ras lus la phyi gnas shing // yid la myi gas
79a2(mdo): sems sas mazung ste// ji skar thag tsa'i sgra ni thos pa bzhin/ yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin stong zhing dper/ gzungs 'di yi ge rnams dang spru la myed// tshig gi lam dang lus dang ngag la'ang byed// de ltar yi ge'i tshul
79a3(mdo): rnams rtogs pas na// smras kyang de'i tshig ni thogs pa myed// de'i ni ston kyang yid la rnam rtog myed// sems la'ang rlom sems myed pa yod myed de// 'on kyang chos 'di rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// chos nyid rab tu 'thar pa
79a4(mdo): chos kyang ston pa/ gang che de'i sa gzungs ni thob gyu rang na// so so yang dag rig bzhi rjes su rtogs// don la rab bslabs chos nyid chog shes// sgra dang skad dang nges pa'i tshig la mkhas// de bzhin spobs
79a5(mdo): pa thogs myed tshad kyang myed// de ni kun rdzob don dam shes pa ste/ de bzhin sna tshogs zab mo bstand pa shes// lugs 'byung lugs/ las bzlog pa de'ang shes// mthon dmar 'gro ba rnams la 'ang pha
79a6(mdo): mthar phyin/ sems zhum pa na rab tu 'dzin la mkhas// de bzhi na khengs rnams tshar gcod shes la mkhas// bstan pa dag la bya ba'i tshul kun shes// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las rnams sa// shes pa
79a7(mdo): thogs byed rnam par nges pa 'dug/ gzungs dang ldan pa'i tshig sa 'khrul pa myed// nyes pa spangs shing brtan por gyu rad pa yin// sems cad 'dus gzungs yid dang dran pa la// zhugs par gyur da na chos shes zhugs pa ste/
79a8(mdo): thos pa gang yang nams kyang chud myi za/ ji skad thos pa mtshungs par ril gis 'dzind // gzungs ni chos nyid 'gal ba ma yin la/ de ni chos la zha'ang ma yin te/ chos dang shi nad tu myi mtshungs myi mnyam mnyam// chos nyid sbyor
79a9(mdo): dang ldan phyir bzod nas zhi// myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs kyi sbyor ba 'di bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di snyand pa na/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi nang nas/ klu'i khri nyis stong gis bla na byed
79b1(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag gis tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs dus na myi bang pa'i sa ma tog gi gzungs 'di thos das/ ji ltar daspar ra de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyon
79b2(mdo): pa de kho na bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la chos stonang par gyurd cig ces kyang smras so// myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs kyi phan yon gyi le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o//
79b3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu'i skye gnas su skyes pa dag kyang 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid la/ 'di ni
79b4(mdo): myir gyur pa kha cig ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rdo myi thog pa ni ngo mtsha ra lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ sha ri'i bu khri nyis stong po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab
79b5(mdo): la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de las/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i gtam cig thos so// thos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la legs so zhes bya ba gso lad te/
79b6(mdo): theg pa chen po ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ legs so legs so zhes tshig tu smras so// myi dge ba'i 'du 'dzi 'di lta ste/ 'jab shes kyi khyim dang / slongs mo sten pa'i khyim yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ tshul khris
79b7(mdo): rnams nyams su ma blangs par gyur te/ tshul khrims nyams par byas pa des na// 'di dag de nas shi 'phos nas/ klu'i skye gnas su skyes par gyur to// 'di dag gis theg pa chen po'i gtam de thos la/ bcom
79b8(mdo): ldan 'das de la yang legs so zhes pa gsol ba'i rgyu de dang rkyen de dang dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni/ da ltar nga las theg pa chen po'i gtam thos te/ myi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs bstan pa thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
79b9(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyes so// sha ri'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/ ngas 'di dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand te/ bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa dag na de
80a1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa yang bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la/ mchod pa byas nas byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs te/ bskal pa mngon par dka' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten
80a2(mdo): gyi khams dri ma myed pa'i snying por bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba dang / bsod nams bla ma zhes bya ba dang / chos bla ma zhes bya ba dang
80a3(mdo): shes rab phra ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan 'di bzhir 'thun pa sha stag gi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang bskal pa de gcig kho na la 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dper na bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs
80a4(mdo): rgyas stong 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das ba la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad sa gang gi tshe/ bdag bskal pa'i dang por rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas/
80a5(mdo): pa dang / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'kho/ ra ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ klu dang klu'i bu dang klu'i bu mo dag nyung bar gyur da te/ bdag kyang
80a6(mdo): 'khor nyung bar gyur da/ bcom ldan 'das da ni rgya mtsho chen po'in nga na klu dang klu'i bu dang / klu'i bu mo dag kyang / 'di ltar tshad ma mchis ta/ grangs kyis mtha' rtogs par myi nus lags na/ bcom ldan
80a7(mdo): 'das 'di la chu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dra pa/ klu'i bdag po gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas // tshul khrims dag pa yongs su rdzogs
80a8(mdo): par ma byas te/ cho ga nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyam pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa ni yongs su rdzogs par ma byas la de dag gi lta ba yang drang por gyur da te/ des na sems can dmyal ba rnams su ni myi skye'o// shi 'phos
80a9(mdo): nas klu'i gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig mi gsung rab las ni srog chags khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad cho ga dang / 'tsho ba dang / tshul khrims nyes
80b1(mdo): 6/ shi namam nas bu'i sku gdas rnams su skyes so// de bzhi gshegs pa gser thub kyi gsung rab mas ni/ srog chams khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag drug bcu ba ni rab tu byung ba las tshul khrims 'das pan
80b2(mdo): gyurd pas shi 'phos te/ klu rnams kyi skye gnas su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab las ni srog chags khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad bcu cho ga dang mtsho ba dang / tshul khrims nyams te/
80b3(mdo): shi 'phos ste/ klu'i skye gnas rnams su skyes so// klu'i bdag po da ltar nga'i gsung rab 'di las ni srog chags khyim pa dang sa rgyas bye ba phrag chu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu byung ba las/ mod pa sna tshogs dang 'thab pa sna tshogs
80b4(mdo): dang / 'du 'dzi sna tshogs kyis cho ga dang 'tshe ba dang / tshul khrims nyams te/ shi 'phos nas klu'i skye gnas rnams su skye zhing skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin te des na da ltar klu dang /
80b5(mdo): klu'i bu dang klu'i bu mo rnams de ltar tshad myed do// klu'i bdag po/ da dung yang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og phyi ma'i dus phyi/ ma'i tshe na/ dge slong sdig can+da rnams dang / dge slong ma sdig can
80b6(mdo): rnams dang / dge bsnyen sdig can rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma sdig can rnams tshul khrims nyams pas klu'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i nang nas kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su/
80b7(mdo): ltung bar 'gyur ro// gso ldang pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung bar gtogs la/ tshul khrims nyams pa klu'i skye gnas rnams su skyes pa dang / skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag gi las rnams la khyad par ci mchi/
80b8(mdo): phigs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phral dbu TA klu'i bdag po rab tu byung bar gtogs pa/ tshul khrims nyam sa pa klu'i spyi gnas rnams su skyes pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gi sbyor ba ni yongs sum ngas la
80b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la yid ches pa'i phyir/ de dag gi bsam pa ni yod de/ de dag ni klu'i skye gnas de nas shi 'phos nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa de'i stobs kyis lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ bskal
81a1(mdo): pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi bstan pa la theg pa ji lta ba bzhin du mos par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po zhugs pa rnams ma rtogs par thams
81a2(mdo): cad kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa'i che ba nyid dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par la ltos// 'di ltar sems can
81a3(mdo): dag myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas/ khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom
81a4(mdo): ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang thos pa don mchis pa lags te ngo mtshar lags so// 'di ltar smad du ma mchis pa'i las can rnams kyi sangs rgyas la dmyigs pa'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa yang chab 'tshal
81a5(mdo): bar myi 'gyur/ de ni de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i/ bar du rgyur 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di lta ste/ mthong ba dang
81a6(mdo): thos pa don mchis par sems bskyed par 'tshal lo// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bdag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma chis par gyur da cig/ bdag sems rmongs par ma gyur da cig/
81a7(mdo): dge ba la rmongs pa dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la rmongs par ma gyur cig/ bdag che rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /
81a8(mdo): sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang bral bar ma gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya ma tsho'i bu dpal gi 'azi' brjid la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bya b.ras khyod kyis sems can thas
81a9(mdo): cad kyi rten gyi sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// 'di lta bu'i skrag pa'i bsam pa dang 'di lta bu'i snying rje chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas so/
81b1(mdo): bdun dang / zla ba bdun dang / zhag bdun du bshad kyang mthar phyin par bshad par myi spyod de/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tsho gas de tsam du/ tshad myed pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya
81b2(mdo): mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas de'i mod la bcom
81b3(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog u dag byung ngo // 'od gser de dag gi sa 'jig rten
81b4(mdo): kyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi gzi brjid dang / 'od kyang mog mog por byas nas
81b5(mdo): phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas na/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
81b6(mdo): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pas
81b7(mdo): zhus pa/ bde bshegs bsod nams brgyas spras sku mnga' ba/ mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan pa'i sku// zla ba lta bur dri myed dag pa'i zhal// ci'i slad du mdzum pa ston pa mdzad// bcom ldan dri myed
81b8(mdo): dri ma gsum bral ba/ za ba myi mnga' rnam dag pad mo'i spyan// swa dang lha ma yin dang klus mchod la// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan chems snyoms thags bzang kar ba ldan// stobs
81b9(mdo): bcu maral bzhir dri gsung gda' ba'i zhal/ rga dang 'chi ba mtha' thug mdzad pa po// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma myed pa'i thugs/ mgon po thugs kyis dgra zur mnyam smos/
81b10(mdo): zugs ni ri bo lta bur gyi g.yo ba// bcom ldan 'dum pa'i dod 'dir dka' stsal gsolang / bcom ldan tshangs pa'i sgra skad sgrogs pa'o// myi 'am ci dang ka la bying ka dang / dza ska la
81b11(mdo): bur snyan cing dga' ba dang / gnyen por gsung ba 'dzum pa pa'i thabs gsungs shig/ 'dren pa thogs pa myed pa'i blo mnga' ba// dus gsum 'gro ba'i spyod dang mos pa dang // dbang po rnams kyang
81b12(mdo): rab tu mkhyend pa po// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa stond pa mdzad// bcom ldan smad pa'i rgyal po mya rnams dang / lga klu rnams kyi nad ni zhi mdzad pa// bcom ldan gtan du bde ba ston pa po// ci'i slad
81b13(mdo): du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// yon tan mnga' ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ wA dang myi rnams khrag khrig nyan cing mchis// thos na yid ni rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing // thams cad mkhyenang
81b14(mdo): pa'i dgongs pa bgyid par 'gyur// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'a/ di skad ces bka' stsal da to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis klu'i
81b15(mdo): rgyal po'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid nga'i mdun du 'dug nas/ lA ga pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan
81b16(mdo): 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dpal gyi gzi brjid 'di ni bskal pa grangs myed pa phrag brgyad brgya na/ bskal pa kun tu lta ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
81b17(mdo): su dag cing brtan par/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo dpal gyi gzi brjid 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don yod pa spyod cing/
81b18(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa mnyes par byas te mchod pa byas nas/ rab tu byung ste tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// sems can tshad myed pa yang theg pa gsum gyis yongs su sbyin par byed do// kun
81b19(mdo): bdun dang / zla ba bdun dang / zhag bdun du bshad kyang mthar phyin par bshad par myi spyod de/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tsho gas de tsam du/ tshad myed pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya
81b20(mdo): mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chung nas/ re'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas de'i mod la bcom
81b21(mdo): ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / bcod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog u dag byung ngo // 'od gser de dag gi sa 'jig rten
81b22(mdo): gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi gzi brjid dang / 'od kyang mog mog por byas nas
81b23(mdo): phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas na/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
81b24(mdo): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad pas
81b25(mdo): zhus pa/ bde bshegs bsod nams brgyas spras sku mnga' ba/ mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan pa'i sku// zla ba lta bur dri myed dag pa'i zhal// ci'i slad du mdzum pa ston pa mdzad// bcom ldan dri myed
81b26(mdo): dri ma gsum bral ba/ za ba myi mnga' rnam dag pad mo'i spyan// lha dang lha ma yin dang klus mchod la// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan chems snyoms thags bzang kar ba ldan// stobs
81b27(mdo): bcu ma ral bzhir dri gsung gda' ba'i zhal/ rga dang 'chi ba mtha' thug mdzad pa po// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma myed pa'i thugs/ mgon po thugs kyis dgra zur mnyam stos/
82a1(mdo): thugs ni ri bo lta bur myi g.yo ba// bcom ldan 'dzum pa'i don 'dir dka' stsal gsolang / bcom ldan tshangs pa'i sgra skad spogs pa'o// myi 'am ci dang ka la bying ka dang / rnga sma lA
82a2(mdo): bur snyan cing dga' ba dang / gnyen por gsung ba 'dzum pa pa'i thabs gsungs shig/ 'dren pa thogs pa myed pa'i blo mnga' ba// dus gsum 'gro ba'i spyod dang mos pa dang // dbang po rnams kyang
82a3(mdo): rab tu mkhyend pa po// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa stond pa mdzad// bcom ldan smad pa'i rgyal po myi rnams dang / lga klu rnams kyi nad ni zhi mdzad pa// bcom ldan gtan du bde ba ston pa po// ci'i slad
82a4(mdo): tu 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// yon tan mnga' ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ lA dang myi rnams khrag khrig nyan cing mchis// thos na yid ni rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing / thams cad mkhyenang
82a5(mdo): pa'i dgongs pa bgyid par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'a/ di skad ces bka' stsa la to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis klu'i
82a6(mdo): rgyal po 'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid nga'i mdun du 'dug nas/ lha ga pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan
82a7(mdo): 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dpal gyi gzi brjid 'di ni bskal pa grangs myed pa phrag brgyad brgya na/ bskal pa kun tu lta ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
82a8(mdo): su dag cing brtan par/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo dpal gyi gzi brjid 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don yod pa spyor cing /
82a9(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa mnyes par byas te mchod pa byas nas/ rab tu byung ste tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// sems can tshad myed pa yang theg pa gsum gyis yongs su sbyin par byed do// kun
82b1(mdo): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan pa de yang 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' bar 'gyur la/ skye bo mang po dang lha
82b2(mdo): dang myi rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur te/ dper na 'tha' bral gyi lha rnams nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du/ de ni myi rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang lo khri
82b3(mdo): thub par 'gyur ro// de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug bcu yod do// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni 'bum phrag bcu gnyis 'du bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don
82b4(mdo): yod de/ sems can gang gi myig sngar snang ba de dag kyang mthong ba'i mod la/ byams pa'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ni/ mthong
82b5(mdo): mod la sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// de la nyan no/ sa kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni dang po mthong bas/ rgyun tu zhug par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis mthong bas ni lan cig phyir
82b6(mdo): 'od ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// sran gsum mthong bas ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// lan pa'i mthong bas ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
82b7(mdo): dpa'i theg pa par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod de/ mthong ba'i mod kho nas myi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu
82b8(mdo): dag cing brtan pa na/ sems can su yang tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ lta ba nyams pa 'am/ cho ga nyams pa 'am/ 'tsho ba nyams par myi 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid nges par 'gyur ro// sems
82b9(mdo): can de nas shi 'phos pa su yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar myi 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad swa dang myi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i/
83a1(mdo): dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ mu tig gi dra ba nor bu rin po che 'bum gris smras pa/
83a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ mngon gsum du bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod pa// myi dbang zla ba dri myed 'od kyi
83a3(mdo): zhal/ gzi brjid mtha' yas lha dang myis mchod pa/ mtshungs myed stobs ldan mtha' yas shugs mnga' ba// ye shes tshad ma mchis la mgos phyag 'tshal// phan par mdzad pa'i ye shes tshad ma mchis//
83a4(mdo): de bzhin shes rab 'on kyang bsam myi khyab/ tshul khrims dri myed rab brtan rnam par dag/ myi dbang mkha' dkyil 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa dpag tu myed pa mtha' yas par// spyod pa spyad nas sangs rgyas ye /
83a5(mdo): brnyes/ des na 'gro ba'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyenang // de bzhi na de dag dbang po bsam pa mkhyend// 'jig rten bcom ldan gzu/ kas dang mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir 'gro ba lta bas chog ma
83a6(mdo): 'tshal// de'i nyon mongs skye bar myi 'gyur zhing // de tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab tu ni// ka la bing ka'i khu byug myi 'am ci// de bzhin tshangs pa'i sma dang A myin smra// phyogs bcu dag yid 'ong
83a7(mdo): sma de dag/ bde gshegs gsung gcig gis ni zi lad kyis mnan/ mkha' las zla ba rab tu lcus gda'// rgya mtsho skabs shing ri rab rnyil yang gdal// sa la gnam spur dum bu brgyar 'gyur gda'/
83a8(mdo): rgyal ba bka' ni gzhan du yod myi gsung // bden pa'i brtul zhugs rab 'brel ston pas 'dir// sangs rgyas ye shes gtso bos bdag lung bstan// bdag ni rgyal ba rang byung yon gnas 'gyur// bdag
83a9(mdo): la yid gnyis som nyi dogs ma mchis/ phyogs bcu dag tu rin cen legs spras pa// bye ba mtha' sas 'dren pa rnams la phul/ byang chub sems gcig bskyed pa gang lags la/ bsod nams sngams
83b1(mdo): 'di'i char myi bod// gang zhig byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bgyid// de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa mchog tu 'phags// gang zhig 'dren rnams tshul 'di myi gcod pa// de ni stobs bcu kun gyi bka'
83b2(mdo): drin bzo// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid des// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di smras pa na/ srog chags khris bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
83b3(mdo): de dag gis tshig 'di skad du/ kar kyi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod des byang chub brnyes pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de dang zad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su ras
83b4(mdo): cing brtan pa der skye bar gyur da cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing mchod pa dang bsnyed bkur yang bgyid par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og tu bdag cag kyang byang chub
83b5(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur da cig ces kyang smras/ so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag thams cad 'jig rten/ gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod kyi sangs rgyas
83b6(mdo): kyi zhing de skye bar lung bstan to// lung bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos 'di skad ces
83b7(mdo): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo mang po la smad pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ rgya mtsho chen por sang gdugs chod gsol
83b8(mdo): bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ dre ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang de ma lags pa yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i
83b9(mdo): sems can chad ma mchis pa dag mchis te/ de dag gis de ba'i de gshegs pa mthong na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed par 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos thos pas kyang 'khor ba thog ma mchis pa'i mtha 'a cog
84a1(mdo): par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis klu'i rgyal po'i gnas kyang yongs su longs spyad par 'gyur te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis brnyas par myi 'gyur lnga/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs
84a2(mdo): rgyas kyi che ba nyid bstan par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i chos nye bar brtan pa bgyis par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la thugs brtsa ba dang /
84a3(mdo): sems can tshad myed pa'i ngag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gnang ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dka'
84a4(mdo): pa dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lA mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ yan bdun bskor ba byas te/ dbu nga dang bcas 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi thar nas myi
84a5(mdo): snang bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du phyir song ngo // de na sa der skye bo'i tshogs 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces smra/ sa so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs chod
84a6(mdo): gsol bar spyan drangs te/ des kyang bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gyis der khyed kun gyis kyang lhan cig tu mthun pa dang / yang dag par dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
84a7(mdo): la brtson par gyis shig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog dang / sim mchog dang / thang bzangs ris la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes/
84a8(mdo): bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen po 'dir gshegs kyis/ der khyod 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis skabs phye ba lags kyis bdag
84a9(mdo): gi gnas su spyon cig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / dri ma myed pa dang / 'od can dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / bkod pa dang / sag na rdo rje dang / brjod bya
84b1(mdo): dang / kha dog thams cad ston pa dang / tsan dan gyi rnam pa dang / de las stsogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag du ma la smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba/
84b2(mdo): dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bdag gi gnas su spyon cig/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ gzho nu dpal kye ka'i brjid la bsgo ba/ bzhin bzangs khyod song la/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i rkang pa la mgos phyag
84b3(mdo): 'chol la/ nga'i 'phrin 'di skad ces gyis shig/ bdag gi pha'i mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bshos gsol gis rgya mtsho chen por spyon cig ces gis shig/ legs so zhes byas/
84b4(mdo): te mnyan nas/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i Ta dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis byas so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ k+Sha 'i rgyal po thugs drag la spras pa/ shugs drag khyod song la ri rab kyi/
84b5(mdo): steng du song ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyang / bos shig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis/ rgya mtsho chen po
84b6(mdo): bdag gi gnas su spyon cig gis shig// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya ma chos ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du/ klu shugs drag klu'i rgyal po dga' bo pa/ nye dga' gnyis dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi thar
84b7(mdo): du song nas/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du spyan drangs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rang gi gnas su 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa/ bye dU r+ya sngon po dag pa dang / 'dzam bu chu'i gser las byas pa bshams te/ rin po che
84b8(mdo): du mas ni smas/ rin po che'i dra bas ni khebs par byas/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba ni spungs/ dar gyi ldu ldi mang po ni btags/ bla re ni bres rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni sme ba/ rgya mtsho'i spos kyi mchog gis ni bdugs/ me
84b9(mdo): tog ga tshogs ni bzas ste/ 'khor gyi khyams yangs shing chul ba de'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sing ge'i khri 'phang du dpag yang bcu gnyis pa/ rin po sethams cad kyis sbas pa spa rdzas kyi ngas bcos bu
85a1(mdo): pa sna tshogs du ma mang po gting ba/ bla re bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bus bskor ba rin po che'i dra bas khebs pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sbyangs pa/ dar gi lde ldi btags pas brgyad
85a2(mdo): pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig bshams so// dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi bdan yang ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bshams so// ro brgyas bsgos pa'i zhal zas dag kyang ma shams te/
85a3(mdo): thams cad legs par zin par rig nas bu dang gnyen 'ad ba dang / 'khor dang bcas te ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim la 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod bab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
85a4(mdo): gsol to// chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes rgya chen khyad par brnyes// ye shes 'byung nas mkha' 'dra ye shes mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten 'das pa spyan yangs dag pa'i spyan dang ldan// phan pa mdzad pa
85a5(mdo): gdugs chod bab kyis gshegs su gsol// tshangs pa'i ga/ sung dang rnam dag gsung ldan dbyangs snyan pa/ ka la bing ka rda sma bdud rtsi'i don ston pa/ sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs sna
85a6(mdo): tshogs mun sel pa// sems cad rin cen gdugs chod pab kyis gshegs su gsol// zhi zhing rab zhi thugs mnga' rtag tu zhi bar spyod// rgyal ba grol ba lA dang myi rnams rab grol mdzad//
85a7(mdo): nu bo bzhi las rgal ba 'gro ba grol ba po// pha rol pa gshegs pa bde sbyin gdugs tshod dus la bab/ sbyin dus yang dag sdom dges tshul khrims yongs su dag/ bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che/
85a8(mdo): po brnyes/ bsam gtan rnam tha ra dges pa shes rab yongs su rdzogs// zhal ras zla 'dra gdugs chod bab kyis gshegs su gsol// lam mkhyen lam la mkhas shing ngan pa'i lam srang ngan pa spangs/
85a9(mdo): byang chub yan lag dbang stobs bden pa bzhi ston pa// yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul bzhi dang dran dang ldan// thams cad zil gnon yon tan mnga' ba gdu kas tshor bab// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' bsod nams
85b1(mdo): rgya'i tog/ bsod nams 'tshal rnams bsod nams zhi chen bcom ldan 'das// mchod sbyin dam pa'i bshes pa'i 'os lags yon gyi gnas// byams la dgyes pa gdugs tshod bab kyis gshegs su
85b2(mdo): gsol// lhun po 'dra zhing sa dang mtshungs la sbyor ba snyoms/ byams sdang myi mnga' nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs// myi'i dbang po khebs pa myi mnga' dman myi mnga'// spyong dang rnam par tha ra la
85b3(mdo): dgyes pa gdugs chod pa ba// kun mkhyen kun la mkhas pa dus dang cho ga mkhyen/ chos rnams 'byed la mkhas pa rtag tu dus bzhin spyod/ sems can bsam pa rab mkhyend don rig mkhyen par ldan//
85b4(mdo): chos kyi ngo bo nyid mkhyen gdugs tshod dus la bab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho gdugs tshod la bab pa de thugs su chud nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
85b5(mdo): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gdugs tshod la bab kyis/ spung gzang dang chos gos long la/ sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir rgya
85b6(mdo): mtsho chen por 'deng ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskorang // nyan thos kyi dgel 'dun gyis ni mdun du bdang / lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/
85b7(mdo): lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis ni bstod de/ ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du sted gyi bar snang la 'phags te/ gshegs nas 'od gzer ni 'gyed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni snang bar mdzad/ pad ma'i char ni 'bebs
85b8(mdo): sil snyan 'bum ni sgrogs/ klu dbyangs 'bum ni smag par mdzad de/ rgya mtsho 'gram ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na dka' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' zhes bya ba'i tsam pa ka'i tshal ga la ba der
85b9(mdo): gshegs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pas byas so// mchod pa byas nas
86a1(mdo): gdugs chod phab po// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di snyam du sems ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bdag gi gnas su gshegs pa ni/ bdag gi rigs su ma yin cha ma yin gyis//
86a2(mdo): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ them skas ji lta bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs pa de kho na lta bu'i thes skas dag byin gyis brlabs la/
86a3(mdo): them skas de dag las bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen por gshegs par bya gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram nas rang gi gnas kyi bar du them skas kyi rim pa gsum bshams te// gcig/
86a4(mdo): ni gser las byas/ gcig ni bye du r+ya las byas gcig ni mu tig dmar po las byas te/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ bkra ba lta/ na sdug pa dag bshams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tsaM
86a5(mdo): nas rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po sus kyang myig gis myi mthong ba da/ nga/ chus kyang sems can dag la gnod par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las kyang 'od gang gis
86a6(mdo): rgya mtsho chen po snang bar gyur da nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ja garten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od 'gyed par mdzad do// rgya mche chen po na sems can gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'od des
86a7(mdo): reg pa tsam gyis byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnyen pa'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems su gyur te/ phyin cad su yang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba myed cing gnod pa byed pa myed de/ de dag thams cad
86a8(mdo): gcig la gcig pa mar 'du shes par gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi bkod pa blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
86a9(mdo): byigyi bzhin 'brang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong las sogs pa ska dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang snam /
86b1(mdo): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci rang lho phye chen po rnams dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' ba'i tsam pa ka'i tshal nas langs te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos them skas kyi rim pa bags
86b2(mdo): pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lpags nas them skas dbu ma la ni bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// g.yas rol na ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams mkhod do// g.yon rol na ni nyan thos chen po rnams 'khod do// 'dun
86b3(mdo): logs na ni brgya byin bye ba phrag drug bcu lag pa g.yas pas lam mtshon par byed do// tshangs pa bye ba phrag drug bcu ni nam mkha'i dkyis na 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i gdugs rnams 'dzin to// swa bye ba
86b4(mdo): phrag drug bcu ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'khod de me tog gi char 'bebs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan bye ba phrag drug bcu dkrol
86b5(mdo): par byed do// lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag drug bcu ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shul spos chus chag chag 'debs so// klu'i bu mo bye ba phra ga drug bcu ni nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de/ ro stod khebs pa'i mu
86b6(mdo): tig gi 'phreng ba dag byang bar byed de/ myi 'am ci bye ba phrag drug cu ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pas bstod par byed do// dri za bye ba phrag drug bcu ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me tog gi
86b7(mdo): 'phreng ba rnams 'phyang bar byed do// lA ma yin bye ba phrag drug bcu ni ras bcos bu kha dog sna tshogs stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'gebs par byed do// klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa yang 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang /
86b8(mdo): nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de/ mye tog dang / spos dang / bya ma dang / thug pa dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang sil snyan dang bu dbyangs dang / pheg rdob pa dang / lha'i bkod
86b9(mdo): pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed de/ de la sa stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po drug khri bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
87a1(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po bye ba khrag khrig
87a2(mdo): phrag 'bum klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dga' bar bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lpags so// de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i bkod pa snga ma gang yin pa de mog mog por
87a3(mdo): byed cing myi mngon par byed pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa dga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer can nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi tog dang /
87a4(mdo): 'od kyi dpal gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga gus pa myi 'khrug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon pa kul nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang / klang
87a5(mdo): chen spos kyi glang po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa nyi zla'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa ra snang byed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge dang / seng
87a6(mdo): ge'i blo gros gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams myig myi 'dzum sa pa nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sbyar ba dang / chos thams
87a7(mdo): cad dbang byed pa gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rin cen dkyil 'khor can dang / rin
87a8(mdo): cen ta la la kanyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams da'a'i snying po nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang / rnam par gnos
87a9(mdo): pa don yod gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu lta ba nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi rgyal po dang / chos kyi/
87b1(mdo): rgyas po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mthong na dga' ba nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jos
87b2(mdo): pa dang / zag 'joms rgyal po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rin cen ldan nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rab
87b3(mdo): dang / sgrib pa thams pad na su du mos pa gnyis 'os so// desar thogs nas kyang byung nab sems dbya rje bzhan zhig 'dus pas byem yang // klu'i rgyal po rgyam tsho dga' bar bya ba dang / de bzhidas /
87b4(mdo): pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lpags so// de nas bcom lda na 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi mo 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs
87b5(mdo): rgyas kyi bkod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang / sangs rgya sa kyi mchod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra chen pos
87b6(mdo): phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa dag 'od kyis khwa ba par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gis go bar mdzad nas lha 'bum gyis sis snyan dang klu'i dbyangs len cing me tog gi char
87b7(mdo): 'bebs ya ngan song thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsgrubs nas/ snying rje chen po brtan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin /
87b8(mdo): la snyoms par zhugs so// bkod pa bsam gyis kyi khyab pa des bus/ rim po che'i them skas de dag las/ rgya mtsho chen por gshegs te/ de lta bu'i glu dbyangs len pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
87b9(mdo): rapag du myed par gsung gis go bar ma dzad nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / brgya
88a1(mdo): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyo rnams dang / lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / ska ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phe chen po dang /
88a2(mdo): myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs pa mthong ngo // de na lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / lha ma yin
88a3(mdo): gyi bu mo dang / nam mkha' lding gyi bu mo dang / dra za'i bu mo dang / myi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo bya ba phrag 'bum dag gis/ sil snyan dang / klu'i dbyangs len cing bcom ldan 'das mdun nas bsus
88a4(mdo): nas/ de'i tshe rgyud kyi sgra skad las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa khyad par du 'phags pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sbyin pa las byung tshul khrims mdzes dang ldan// bzod pa'i stobs las
88a5(mdo): byung ba byams par bsgoms// brtson 'grus las byung don gyi rgya ma/ cho lags/ bsam gtan rnam thar da dgyes pa khyod phyag 'a tshal// shes rab 'od ldan dgongs pa rnam par dag/ 'od dang gan
88a6(mdo): brjid dpal gis mngon par brgyan// rnam par grol ba mngon sum ston mdzad pa/ thub pa nyon mongs bsil ya phyag 'tshal lo// brtu la zhugs shin tu rdzogs pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub
88a7(mdo): mthar phyin rtogs par thugs su chud/ myig ni sbyin par mdzad cing myig sbyor ba/ 'gro ba kun tu rgyu ba 'gro ba'i mchog/ don dam zab mo shind tu stond pa po// gzhan yang phan pa zla myed thugs su chud// chags pa myed
88a8(mdo): par tshig gi don ston pa// gzhan la phan pa dpe myed 'od mdzad pa/ dus skabs mkhyend pa kun tu stond pa po// rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs kun rab 'joms pa// brtul zhugs yongs su rdzogs pa brtul zhugs mchog/
88a9(mdo): bdud rtsi'i bde spyad bde ba spyan mdzad pa/ nam mkha' 'dra zhing dgongs pa dag pa ste/ dri ma kun sel rnam par 'dren pa po// yon tan rgya mtsho bsod nams myi zad pa// rgya mtshor 'jug pa ye shes rgya mtshor ldan/
88b1(mdo): chos kyi dbang phyug nyon mongs sel mdzad pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag ser sna myi mnga' ba/ chos kyi rin cen nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ chos mchog ye shes de nyid ston pa'o// dga' ba ston pa bden pa ston mdzad pa/ bag la
88b2(mdo): nyal gyi nyes pa spong ba ston / ri'i dbang po bzhin du myi g.yo ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// myi dang lA dang mkha' lding gas pab pa/ lha myin srin po myi 'am ci'i bdag/ klu rnams dang ni tshul
88b3(mdo): bum gnod sbyin rnams// khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang 'tshal// mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan pa ste/ rab mdzes dpe myed shin tu ston mdzad pa// gser gyi mdog can dpal ldan mdo ga sug pa/ sen/
88b4(mdo): mo bangs 'dra sa dog sdug phyag sa kyis mnyam// kas bying ga'isam thanas ma car gzung / ringam pa lta dbang gdangs can 'dus rtson// gsung gis slor gsum mo ma 'byings par mdzad/
88b5(mdo): 'jam mnyer gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po dul zhing thugs kyang dul ba ste/ zhal ras zla ba 'dra zhing spun legs pa/ rtag tu bden pa gsung zhing mnyam par gzhag/ rtag tu chos 'dzin
88b6(mdo): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgand sdug bsngal rab tu grol mdzad pa// 'gro ba don mdzad nyon mongs spong mdzad pa// rgyal bar 'os pa bdud 'jom sa rgyal ba po// skye ba zad pa de nyid sngon mdzad pa// dgra bcom
88b7(mdo): dgra'i tshogs rnams rab 'joms pa/ rnams 'das pa sngam rnams kyis mchod// khyod ni ga ng+gA bzhem pa ma chos kyi mchog/ skye sa tham tshan 'dred pa pagang thos das// de das pa'i bu mo dang / rba'i
88b8(mdo): mo dang / sna ma yin dang / kyi 'am ci dang / nam mkha' ldid dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dri ba'i bu mo de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ma tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par brtson nas// thams cadag ni
88b9(mdo): tu 'thun pa mgyur da pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// rang rang kyi rgyan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsos to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por gzhes
89a1(mdo): rgyas chen po'i gting gi dkyil gyi gnas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi khams bkod pa kal ba der gshegs nas/ seng ge'i khri des bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun nams dang / byang rngus
89a2(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyang ban ji skar bgams pa de dag la 'bod do// de nas bu'i rgyal po rgya mchos bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhugs par rig na sde bu dang bcas/
89a3(mdo): chung ma dang bcas/ gnyen 'dab dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas/ rang gi lag gis zhal zas lo brgya dang ldan pa bsod pa mang pos tshim par byed cing 'i zhed pa stobs par byed do// tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs
89a4(mdo): nas/ bshos gsol lags te/ gsang sder gyu ba dang / phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho/ lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'o
89a5(mdo): ci dang / lto 'phe chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong rnams dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig du bcom
89a6(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshogs te/ 'khod par thugs su chud nas bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos
89a7(mdo): mnyan pa'i zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer sku las 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od gzer de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ srog chags rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mdun
89a8(mdo): na bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas/ chos mnyan pa la brod cing gus pa dang bcas pas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing 'khod par gyur da to//
89a9(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni/ las sna tshogs kyis bskyod nas/ sems kyi dmyigs pa sna tshogs kyis las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon
89b1(mdo): bar 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed de/ de'i 'gro ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to// klu'i bdag po rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa dang / tha mal pa ji snyed snang ba la ltos// klu'i bdag
89b2(mdo): po 'di dag thams cad ni rang rang gi sems dang dge ba dang myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las sna tshogs kyis sna tshogs su byas pa dag go// sems ni gzugs myed pa bstan du myed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po de
89b3(mdo): ltar na chos thams cad ni bcos ma rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de bdag po myed pa/ bdag gi myed pa yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'o// de dag ni las ji ltar bstsags pa bzhin du bsgrubs pa sna chog
89b4(mdo): su byas pa dag ste/ 'di la byed pa po gang yang myed do// de ltar chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do// klu'i bdag po de la mkhas pas chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs
89b5(mdo): pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid shes nas/ dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba da ga khon mngon par 'du byas te/ dag pa mngon par 'du bya ba dag/ mngon par 'du byed pa de'i phung po dang / khams dang / skyem ched
89b6(mdo): nam par bsgrubs nas/ nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par 'bru ba pa gang yin pa de dag ma dzes shing / gzugs bzang la bstan drug pa ra mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs
89b7(mdo): pa'i zla ba rnams rgya kis de sa ldan pa dang/ dris das par bsgrubs pa dang / pa sa pa'i 'dig rted kyi dod par 'dug pa dang / sa m+b+ha thag sa dang
89b8(mdo): pa'i tshangs pa 'di dag kyang mog yog por byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la blta ba na yang / kyis zhal khrul du gyur pa la spos// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi lus kyi rgyad/ gzunas
89b9(mdo): khyim ma / 'didi sa ma ma ni ge bas du byed pa ma pa na brlangs pa 'o// zla'i bdag po khyod kyi zhidapa 'a mapapa
90a1(mdo): brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lU dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'di rnams kyi bkod pa 'di dag
90a2(mdo): thams cad kyang bsod nams las byung ba dag go// klu'i bdag po rgya mtsho chen po 'di gang dag lus sna tshogs// gzugs myi sdug cing dbyibs ma legs pa dang / lus rags shing che ba rnams dang / gang dag yus
90a3(mdo): phra zhing rung ba de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi sems dang dge ba dag dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las sna tshogs kyis sna tshogs su byas pa dag ste/ klu'i bdag po de lta bas na/ khyod kyis las
90a4(mdo): bdag gir bya ba dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la rton par 'gyur ba ru de ltar slobs shig dang las bdag gir bya ba dang las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la rton pa khyed/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag la blo
90a5(mdo): 'jug par 'gyur ro// lta ba chud gzon par byed par myi 'gyur/ ro// chad pa dang / rtag par lta ba la gnas par yang myi 'gyur ro// khyed kyi sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par gyis shig/ mnyes
90a6(mdo): par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar ma byed cig/ bkur sti'i rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i mngon par 'du byed pas kyang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bkur bsti'i gnas su 'gyur bar gyis shig/
90a7(mdo): klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos gcig gis ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar skye bar yang dag par gcod do// chos gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ji ltar gyur cing nyin mtshan rnams 'da'
90a8(mdo): zhing 'dug snyam du dge ba'i chos rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ de dge ba'i chos la so sor rtog pa mang bas/ myi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi go skabs myi 'byed do// de myi dge ba'i chos spangs/
90a9(mdo): dge ba'i chos dang ldan pas bsam pa dge ba'i sems can 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// kwa'i bdag po de la dge ba'i chos de dag
90b1(mdo): gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ lha dang myi'i skye dgu'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsa ba'i rten to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten to// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
90b2(mdo): chub kyi rtsa ba'i rten to// rtsa ba'i rten kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi sam rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba dang / 'dod pas
90b3(mdo): log par g.yes bu spong ba dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba dang / zas spong ba dang / ngag nub po song ba dang / cig kyal ba spong ba dang / ban pa sems spong ba dang / gnod sems spong ba dang / log par lta ba spong ba/
90b4(mdo): ste/ de ni rtsa ba'i rten ces bya'o// klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spang ba'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la myi 'jigs pa byin pa yin
90b5(mdo): de'i sems byams par dmyigs pa la nye bar gnas pa yin/ de'i/ zhe sdang gi bag chags yang dag par chad pa yin/ des nad nyung bar la/ gyur pa'i lam yongs su gzung ba yin/ des tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i sa
90b6(mdo): bon btab pa yin/ de la myi ma yin pa rnams kyang bsrung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed par byed pa yin/ bde bar nyal zhing bde bar sad pa dang / sdig pa'i rmyi lam myi sgri ba yin/ gnyid log pa na yang de la lha
90b7(mdo): nams bsrung ba yin/ de la shar gnyer ba myed pa yin te/ de la shar gnyer ba'i brag la nyal myed pa yin/ ngan 'gro thams cad kyis myi 'jigs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba yin te/ 8
90b8(mdo): tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu po de dag thob po// srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ gal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngon de de byang chub thob pa na tshe'i tshad sems kyi dbang du 'gyur ro//
90b9(mdo): klu'i bdag po la byin par len pa spangs pa skyes bu gang zag ni/ yid btan pa'i chos lnga thob ste lnga gang zhe na/ yongs su spyod che bar yang 'gyur la/ de'i longs spyod de dag kyang rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / chu dang mye dang / brko/
91a1(mdo): bskal pa spyod pa myi mdza ba rnams kyis myi 'phrogs pa yin/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba yin/ dogs pa myed pa yin/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de la pha rol
91a2(mdo): kyi gnod pas 'jigs pa myed pa yin/ de'i sems sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' la 'jug pa yin te/ lnga po de dag go// ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
91a3(mdo): yongs su sngo na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ye shes can du rang gis mngon par rtogs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// klu'i
91a4(mdo): bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag/ ni/ mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dbang po bsngags pa dang / rgod pa las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
91a5(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang / chung ma myi 'phrogs/ pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs// pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
91a6(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na des de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan/ 2 doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa thob bo// klu'i bdag po brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ lha dang myis bsngags pa'i
91a7(mdo): chos brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ud pa la'i dri 'byung bas kha yongs su dag par 'thob pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang / lha dang myi dga' bas dbang gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / yang dag pa'i
91a8(mdo): bsam pa dang ldan pas dogs pa myed par 'gyur ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas lus dang ngag dang / sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / tshig 'khrul pa myed pas mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur
91a9(mdo): pa dang / tshig gzung bar 'os pas ngag nyan par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab thob pas lha dang myir skyes na/ dbang gcig pur 'gyur ba yin te/ brgyad po de dag go// brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/
91b1(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon des de dben pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// klu'i dbang po phra ma spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ myi phyed pa lnga 'thob ste/ lnga gang zhe na/
91b2(mdo): gzhan gis gnod par bya ba dang bral bas lus myi byed pa 'thob pa dang / gzhan dag gis chags pa myed pas/ g.yog 'khor myi byed pa 'thob pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa mthong bas dad pa myi byed pa 'thob
91b3(mdo): dang / bsgrub pa snying por byed pas chos las myi byed pa 'thob pa dang / myi slu bas mdza' bshes myi byed pa 'thob pa ste/ lnga po de dag ko// dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
91b4(mdo): yongs su sngon/ des de g.yog 'khor myi byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pra dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ de'i 'khor bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis dbye bar myi nus so// klu'i
91b5(mdo): bdag po dag rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ ngag yongs/ su dag pa brgyad 'thob la/ shi yos na yang lha dang / myi rnams kyi nang du skye ba ra 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ran pa'i tshig dang /
91b6(mdo): phan pa'i tshig dang / rigs pa'i tshig dang / 'jam pa'i tshig dang / gzung ba'i tshig dang / mnyan pa'i tshig dang / skye bo mang dga' bam tshig dang / myi spad pa'i tshig ste/ brgyad po de dag go// dge ba'i/
91b7(mdo): rtsa ba de ga la te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de tshangs pa'i sgra skad gi gdangs can de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po tshig rgyal ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/
91b8(mdo): gcig tu nges pa gsum 'thob ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ mkhas pa rnams gcig tu nges par dka' ba dang / san legs par glon pas gcig tu nges par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang / bcos ma ma yin pas gcig tu
91b9(mdo): nges par lha dang myi 'a bdag nyid chen po 'thob pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ des de phyed par lung ston cing gzhan du myi gsung
92a1(mdo): ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni bdag po'i chos lnga 'thob ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dbang po ma tshang pa myed pas lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi bdag/
92a2(mdo): po thob pa dang / dgra thams cad kyi myi rdzi bas/ longs spyod dang dbang phyug rgya chen po'i bdag po 'thob pa dang / bsod nams la dbang byed pas de'i sems nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod rgya chen po rnams la 'jug pa dang
92a3(mdo): phyis bkrab pa thob pas rgyal po bdag pos mchod pa dang / sngon phrag dog myed pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams 'bum 'gyur du khyad par 'gyur ba 'thob pa ste/ snga po de dag go// dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa
92a4(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ des de 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gcig pur 'gyu ru ro// klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/
92a5(mdo): yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad 'thob ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ de'i sems rnam par myi 'tshe ba la 'jug pa dang / de'i sems gnod sems rab tu zhi ba la 'jug pa dang / de'i sems rtsod pa myed cing 'thab pa
92a6(mdo): myed pa la 'jug pa dang / de'i sems mnyam pa dang / mnyen pa dang de sa pa la 'jug pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa 'i skye bos bkur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba la mngon par
92a7(mdo): dga' ba'i phyir/ phan pa'i dngos po mang ba dang / skye bo mang pos bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir mdzes pa dang / sems 'jam zhing las su rung ba'i phyir de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar dga' ba myed pa ste/ brgyad po de dag go// dge ban
92a8(mdo): rtsa ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de sems thogs pa myed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lta bas chog myi shes par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag
92a9(mdo): ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag par 'gyur zhing / grogs po dge ba rnyed pa dang / las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la yid ches te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las myi byed pa dang / lhar sangs rgyas 'dzin te/
92b1(mdo): gnan mar gyi 'dri pa dang / dges pa dang brgazhis su 'dzin pa byed pas sa pa drang ba dang / thogs gdang kyi yin te/ dud 'gram skye gnas dang / gzhin rje'i 'jig rten thogs ma yin pa dang / mamod nams 'bar sa byudas
92b2(mdo): xxx
92b3(mdo): yang dag par zhugs pa dang / swa dang kyi rnams kyi rnapar kyi khom pa dang bral ba yin te/ bcu po de dag go// log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba re ka sa te/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/
92b4(mdo): des de byang chub thob pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon sum du 'gyur zhing mngon par shes pa myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as sbyin pa
92b5(mdo): byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing che ring bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba tham/ sa cad las yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par lte ba spangs
92b6(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhi longs spyod myi 'phrogs par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sgra da pa spyod pa na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa blan
92b7(mdo): myed pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa la log par gses pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing chungs kyi gsem par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang de'is dang
92b8(mdo): bu dang / rdungs sa sul dgas pa'i sems kyis par kyi 'gyur ro/ bdun du smra ba sangs pa'i nun sems mas sbyin pa kyi nga / mi khyod cipa zung dang / ba ma thod kyi 'thoms pa dang / rna pa sa
92b9(mdo): 'gyur ba'i ma yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par yang / ji skad snyam pa de bzhin du byed de/ dam bas pa brtan par 'gyung ro// bram spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas phyin 'dri
93a1(mdo): songs spyod che bar 'gyu ba ni gcog la'or gyi byed par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang bsam pa mthun pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor 'thob bo// ngas rtsub po
93a2(mdo): sangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin ba byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing cig btsun par 'gyur la/ nig sun dbyung du myed par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spang pa spyod pa na yang 'khor ma mgu bar su yang gyi
93a3(mdo): 'gro'o// tshig kyal ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod chen por 'gyur zhing / tshig mnyan par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang the tsom thams cad gcod pa la
93a4(mdo): mkhas par 'gyur ro// rnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa rgya chen po dag la de'i sems 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub
93a5(mdo): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang rgya chen po la mos shing / rab/ nga che bar grags par 'gyur ro// gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing mdzes
93a6(mdo): pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar yang 'gyur ro// bya nga chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang blo thogs pa myed la/ dang nga po ma tshang ba myed par 'gyur ro// log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang
93a7(mdo): chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas la dang pa dang yang dag par lta ba'i khyim du skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun
93a8(mdo): la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag sbyin pas brgya na de ltar mthu me zhing phan yon che la/ byin che zhing rgya che bar 'gyur ro//
93a9(mdo): dge ba 'acu'i mas kyim ma 'di ngas nyid/ rgyas nimam gyis brgya pa/ sangs rgyam gyimos pa la pad la sor pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pas brtsamams can dang ba rgyad babang po dang / byangs rgyas kyi
93b1(mdo): gyi kadangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyis brgyan na/ bdud phyir rgol ba 'joms pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthar phyin par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyis brgyan na/ dran pa
93b2(mdo): dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo \u0f7f shes pa dang / brtan pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyan na/ smra ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyan na/ sems can
93b3(mdo): thams cad dang zhe 'gras pa myed par 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bas brgyan na/ sems can zhum pa myed par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyis brgyan
93b4(mdo): na/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin pa byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang chos
93b5(mdo): ba dang / sems dang chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong bas brgyan na/ myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i / chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang
93b6(mdo): pas brgyan na/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / rmongs pa mye da pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong
93b7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyan na/ rdzi ba myed pa dang / dgra dang 'khu ba thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro//
93b8(mdo): lam kyis brgyan na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes 'dren par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyis brgyan na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad cir gcod par 'gyur ro// lpag mthong gis brgyam na// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du song
93b9(mdo): su shes par 'gyur ro// thabs kyis brgyan na/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po mdor na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su/
94a1(mdo): rdzogs pa dang / kyi 'dzigs pa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ klu'i bdug po de ska bas na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyisam 'di dag rgyam pam nam/
94a2(mdo): par rtse ba dang / btsun par brtson par bya'o// kwa'i bdag po dper na mong dang / blong byer dang / grong dus dang / sdongs dang / sa 'tshar dang / rgyas ze'i po blang thams cad dang / ma dang ni shes pa dang / ldan dpa'i mam
94a3(mdo): cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad dang / sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / lo thog thams cad skye ning mo ba dang / shal bas babs pa dang / nga 'byung ba rnams ni sa la gnas te/ de dag gi gnas ni ma yin no// klu'i bdag
94a4(mdo): po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni skra dang myir skye ba dang slob pa dang / myi slob pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang
94a5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no// dge ba bcu'i la sa kyi lam la gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad
94a6(mdo): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgor 'jug pa gang dang lA na na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i nongs pa rnams so// nga zhing / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad spangs nas kyang / khyad par gyi
94a7(mdo): gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgor 'dug pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ klu'i bdag po chos gcig gis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ chos gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste
94a8(mdo): sdom pa la gnas pa nyes pa 'byung ba chags pa ste/ gcig ni de yin no// klu'i bdag po chos gnyis kyis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa dang /
94a9(mdo): su mabyung ba mngon par 'du myi byed pa ste/ de gnyis so// klu'i bdag po chos gsum gyis las kyi sgrib pa rgyud chad par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhen/ 'dis se/ rkyen gyis chom la 'dug pa'i zhes rab la so sor rtog pa dang /
94b1(mdo): myi gsar myi rnying pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa dang / rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// klu'i bdag po chos bzhis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/
94b2(mdo): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa dang / smon pa dang / bral ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa shes pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// klu'i bdag po chos lda
94b3(mdo): las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag myed pa nyid dang / sems can myed pa nyid dang / srog myed pa nyid dang / gang zag myed pa nyid dang / gso ba myed pa nyid dang / lnga po de dag go// klu'i
94b4(mdo): bdag po chos drug pas las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ drug ga nga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa dang / yid ches pa dang / gcig tu nges pa dang / the tsom myed pa dang / yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa dang /
94b5(mdo): lhag pa'i bsam pas las bya ba la 'jug pa ste/ chos drug po de da/ gis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad
94b6(mdo): ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du mchi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa klu'i bdag po chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyad pa
94b7(mdo): du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ del ma chags pa dang / skrag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas brtson 'grus btan pa dang / sems can la sa zhing snying rje re ba dang / bsod nams la
94b8(mdo): cog kyi shes pa dang / thos pa bcas pa la chog phyi zhes pa dang / bag yod pa dang byang chub kyi snying po rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon dusum du 'thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpal gtong ba de/ chos bcu po reng/
94b9(mdo): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po smra gcan gyis 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad
95a1(mdo): kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par
95a2(mdo): 'phags par 'gyur te/ brkyang gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sgra gcan chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni nga rgyal myed pa yin te/ sems can thams can 'dud cing mngon par 'dud pa dang / bka' blo bde ba yin te/ mthun
95a3(mdo): bar 'dzind pa dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang / bla ma rnams la gus pa skyes pa dang / dge ba spyod pa thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa yin te/
95a4(mdo): sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / srog gi phyir yang gzhan yang 'a zhug par myi byed pa dang / kong du yang sems can 'jigs pa rnams la myi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing / skyabs su 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams yos
95a5(mdo): su mya gtong ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes thams cad yongs su tshol ba na/ cho ga myi shes pa ste/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags
95a6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lA ma yin gyi dbang po smre gcan gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas lus che ba nyid dang /
95a7(mdo): gzugs che ba nyid dang / 'khod pa nyid dang / sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan chos pa'i dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas lus che ba nyid thob par
95a8(mdo): 'gyur te/ bzhi keng zhen 'dis ste/ gzhan dag gi spyod lam sa myi 'phya ba dang / de ba'i gshegs pa'i thurnas pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa byed du 'jug pa dang / sems can bye ba dang / 'tha' ba rnams
95a9(mdo): bskum gang / 'thun par bkod nas bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud pa dang / sems can thams can la dab po'i 'bras pa myed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldanan/ byang chub sems
95b1(mdo): dpa' lum leb nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas gzugs che ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos
95b2(mdo): po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byams pa'i myig gis lta ba dang / gzhan byad bzhin bzang po dag la phrag dog dang ser sna myi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
95b3(mdo): dpa' gzugs che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'as 'khor che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshig spong zhing / gzhan gyi 'khor myi 'byed pa dang /
95b4(mdo): gzhan gyi 'khor la dga' ba dang / byang chub kyi sems shinang tu brtan pa dang / kazhan dag byang chub sa 'dzud pa rtse/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po dbazhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'as 'khor che ba hU~M/
95b5(mdo): 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang / sa sems che ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dag ste g.yo myed pa dang / sgyu can ma yin pa dang / 'dun
95b6(mdo): pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / bar ma dor skye ba myed pa dang / rgya chen po la mos shing theg pa dman pa myi 'dod pa dang / chos thams cad rang ba zhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug pas/ chos zam mo'i tshul 'jug
95b7(mdo): pa ste/ sgra gcan chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'as sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'khor sum khra nyes stong dang bcas pa tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/
95b8(mdo): rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rin po che'i me tog rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ khal bcu tshad brgyas/ bcom ldan 'das gtor te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
95b9(mdo): bskyed nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// phyogs bcu dag na sems can khams rnams mtha' yas gang su dag/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rgyal la mchod byed dang /
96a1(mdo): 6/ phyogs bcu dag na sems can gang dag bskal pa 'bum du yang / mchod la brtson pa'i sems can dag ni phan pa byed pa dang / byams dang bsod nams 'phags pa'i rang bzhin las byung mchod pa rnams// ci 'dra ba/
96a2(mdo): dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa ma lags khyod la 'os// mtshungs myed sems kyis yang dag gnas nas bskyedalags pa de ni stobs bcu ldan pa rnams la brjed dang mchod pa lags// bdag ni byang chub reg 'gyur snyam/
96a3(mdo): te de la bsgrim gnas nas/ bdag ni g.yo myed byang chub mtshungs ma mchis la zhugs pa lags/ myi dbang las gzhan srid gsum du yang bdag gi dbang ma mchis/ bdag gi bsam pa ji 'dra'i dbang ni stobs bcu ldan pa lags
96a4(mdo): bdag ni kun la shind tu sdug cing nga rgyal bsal ba dang / sbyin dang dul dang ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan la bzod ldan dang / brtson 'grus dran pa ting nge 'dzin shes rab rnam dag gnas pa dang / byams dang snying rjer ldan
96a5(mdo): zhing bden pa'i chos spyod gyur da cig/ phan bzhed rgyal ba gal te bad ga la lung bston myi mdzad kyang / myi'i dbang po bdag ni rong gis rang / la lung yang bstan/ bdag ni rang byung myi 'gyur snyam du yid gnyis
96a6(mdo): dogs ma mchis/ de ltar bdag ni bsam pa thag pas byang chub nyid sems nges/ myi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad nas zla ba'i tog gis zhus pa ni rang byung 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni tshe legs lung bstan gsol da// gang gi/
96a7(mdo): phyir nangs mi dag pa'i 'od rnams bstan mdzad pa/ zla ba'i tog khyod mnyan par gyis shes ston pas de la gsungs// sA myin sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po byang chub mchog sa zhugs// g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong gang lags rnams kyang
96a8(mdo): de bzhin te/ brgal pa stong zag brgyar mi byed chub spyod pa spyad nas kyang / thams pa rjes su mthun par byang chub gtso bo thob par 'gyur/ rgyal ba gang 'ga' byes skyed rnams la ni mchod bgyis te/ de nas sems cad shini bum
96a9(mdo): po byang chub bkod nas kyang / de'i 'og tu bskal pa dge ba bkod pa mdzes pa la/ byang chub rdul bral zhi ba mya ngan myed par 'tshang yang rgya/ sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po 'di ni chos rgya rgyal por 'gyur/ brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan te//
96b1(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang bgyi// 'jig rten khams kyang dga' ba skyed pa'i bkod pa zhes bgyi ste/ dga' ldan gnas nas 'dra bar 'byor da cing rgyas la lo yang legs/ stobs bcu ldan gyi tshe ni lo grangs bye ba bdun nu ste/
96b2(mdo): dge slong 'phags pa'i dge 'dun khrag khrig drug bcu tham par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu ste/ thos pa dang ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzungs la shi nad tu gnas/ bskal pa dge ba bkod pa zhes
96b3(mdo): bgyi mdzes pa de dag tu/ sems can brgya stong dag ni byang chub bkod pa bgyis nas kyang // 'di dag thams cad rim gyis byang chub mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya// byang chub sems mchog gni yon tan khyad par dag la ltos// der ni
96b4(mdo): sgra gcan bzang po'i lung bstan thos par gyur da nas kyang / srog chags 'bum phrag ba ni dag byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur // se gas pa'i yon tan 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis
96b5(mdo): stong gsum rab g.yos lhas kyang me tog char pa rab tu phab/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'di skad ces gso/ lang to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa
96b6(mdo): byed pa po ma mchis pa lags na/ lung bstan pa ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang lags/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
96b7(mdo): klu'i bdag po de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni bdag myed pa byed pa po myed pa yin te/ de ni chos rnams nyid yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga'i 'dzin pa gnas
96b8(mdo): pa rnams/ sems can myed pa rnams la sems can du 'du shes skyed par byed de/ de lta byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes spong du bzhugs pa dang / ngar 'dzind pa dang /
96b9(mdo): nga'ir 'dzin pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub tu go cha gyon par zad kyi skyes bu dam pa de dag gis sems can myed pa dang / gang zag myong ba myi shes pa ni ma yin te/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang
97a1(mdo): skyes bu dang / gang zag tu lta ba'i sems can de dag yongs su grol bar byed do// klu'i bdag po khyod 'di skad du 'di la lung bstan pa gang lags zhes zer ba gang yin pa de la mngon gsum du chos khong du chud pa ni
97a2(mdo): lung bstand pa'o// sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gso ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed pa la nges par sems pa'i sems dang ldan pa lung bstan pa'o// ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / rtsa ba myed pa dang
97a3(mdo): gnas myed pa la gnas pa na lung bstan pa'o// sems can thams cad mtshungs par bdag myed pa la mos pa ni lung bstan pa'o// chos thams cad mtshungs par chos dben par mngon pa ni lung bstan pa'o// zhing
97a4(mdo): thams cad zhing tu mtshungs par nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing dri ma myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni lung bstan pa'o// chos thams cad sangs rgya sa kyi chos dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / dbyer myed pa'i ye shes mthong
