122b2(mdo): thas gcig tu res par de'i zla bde dpa la 'gro ba dang / coms ma yin pa mamatha' bas gcig tu nges par mad kyi cheb nyid 'thob pa yin te// klu'i bdag potshig byal ba sangs pa'i skyes bu gang cag ni gcig tu ngas pa gsum par
122b3(mdo): de dag 'thob bo// tshig phul ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gas te tha ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyed par lung ston cing gzhan du myi gsung de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// nun
122b4(mdo): bdag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni dbang po lnga 'thob po// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po ma tshang ba myed pas lus dang / ngag dang sems la dbang ba thob pa dang / dgra thams cad kyis myi rdzibs longs spyod
122b5(mdo): dang / dbang phyug la dbang ba rgya chen po 'thob pa dang / bsod nam/ sa kyi dbang gis de'i sems longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po// thams cad la 'gro ba dang / dgab pa mchog thob pas rgyal po dang dbang
122b6(mdo): pos mchod pa dang / sngon phra dog myed pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams de las stong phrag brgyad 'gyur du khyad par tu 'gyur ba 'thob bo// klu/ libadag po brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag mi dbang po lnga po/
122b7(mdo): de dag 'thob bo// brnab sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu sngon/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'jig rten gsum gis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gcig pur
122b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad 'thob po// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i sems rnam par myi 'tshe ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems gno/
122b9(mdo): sems rab tu zhi ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems rtsod pa myed cing 'thab pa myed pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems drang zhing mnyen la nges pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i skye bor grags par 'gyur ba
123a1(mdo): dang/ sems can thams cad bde bar dkal zhing byams pa'i sems phan pa'i dngos po ma ba par 'gyur ba dang / bde ba la mngon par dka' zhing dngab ma la skye bo mang thos sti stang byas par 'gyur ba dang / mos
123a2(mdo): snum zhing las su chung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'thob pa myi dkon par 'gyur ba ste/ klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad po de dag 'thob po// gnod sem
123a3(mdo): spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems thogs pa myed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas myi ngoms par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po
123a4(mdo): log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dge bar 'gyur zhing / grogs po dge ba'i rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la yid ches pas
123a5(mdo): srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las kyi byed pa yin// skar sangs rgyas 'di na gi gzhan lngar myi 'dzin pa yin ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bral bas lta ba rang ba yin/ grogs lha dang myi yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /
123a6(mdo): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa grogs su myi 'gyur ba yin/ bsod nams nges pas khyad par du 'gro ba yin/ log pa thams cad myed pas/ 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba
123a7(mdo): dang bral zhing sdig pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin/ yang dag par song zhing yang dag par zhugs pas sgrib pa myed par mthong ba yin/ lha dang myi rnams kyi nang du myi zhom pa dang bral ba yin te/ klu'i bdag po log par lta ba
123a8(mdo): spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob po// log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ kal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des de la mang
123a9(mdo): rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon tu 'gyur te/ mngon par shes pa myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pas
123b1(mdo): xxx
123b2(mdo): dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi chu'o// chung du ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sgra'o// klu'i bdag po de srog gcod pa bsnyen cing bsgoms te yang du byas na/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gzhing rdon
123b3(mdo): 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par bsgrub ste/ tshe thung ba dang nad mang bar 'gyur ba'o// ma byin par len pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid // dud 'gron
123b4(mdo): skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas ka ral te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par smra ba ste/ longs spyod chung ba dang / thun mod kyi longs gyod du 'gyur ba'o//
123b5(mdo): 'dod pa la log par g.yem pas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de/ nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par sbyin pa kany+dza
123b6(mdo): mngon par sgrub ste/ g.yog 'khor brtan du myi rung ba dang / 'gran zla de pa bcas pa'i chung mar 'gyur ba'o// brdzun du spras pas ni sems can dmyal bar 'khrid do// dud 'grol skye gnas su khrid do// kashin rje'i 'jig ste/
123b7(mdo): tu khrid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du ste na yang rnam par smid pa gnyis mngon par bslab ste/ srur ba yang ba dang / gzhan gyis slu bar 'gyur ro// tha mas ni sems can dmyal bar bzhid do// rud 'gro'i skye gnas su khring do//
123b8(mdo): bzhin rje'i 'jig rten du b+h+rid do// de das gal gyi rnamapa kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par ba ste/ gcog lakhor gyi 'dus pa dang / gson 'kho ngan par 'gyur ro// cig chub mo sa ni sernam
123b9(mdo): bar khrid do// dud 'grol skye gnas su khring ngo // gzhi na rje'i 'jig rten du zhing ngo // de nas gal te gyi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ yid du kyi'o pab zos pa dpa'athab mo 'i cig tu
124a1(mdo): ga'agyur ba'o// tshig rgyal bas ni sems cad dmyal bar zhid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du nyid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ gzung bar
124a2(mdo): 'os pa'i tshig ma yin pa dang / ma nges pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o// brnab sems kyis ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du zid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na ya/
124a3(mdo): rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ chog myi zhes pa dang / 'dod pa che bar 'gyur ba'o// gnod sems kyis ni dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi
124a4(mdo): du skyes na yang / rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ myi phan pa 'dogs pa dang / gzhan gis gnod par bya bar 'gyur ba'o// log par lta bas ni sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i
124a5(mdo): 'jig rten du khrid do// de nas gal te myi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang / rnam par sbyin pa gnyis mngon par smra ba ste/ lta ba ngan pa ltung ba dang / g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur ba'o// klu'i bdag po de ltar na myi dge ba bcu po 'di
124a6(mdo): dag gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po tshad myed pa yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod myi
124a7(mdo): 'phrogs pa dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dayang gzhan gis gnod pa bya ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// klul bdag po ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa
124a8(mdo): sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod gyi 'phrogs pa dang / dngos po thams cad la myi lta bar yongs su gtong ba can du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa pyod pa na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
124a9(mdo): cad yang dag par sgrub pas/ thar byed pa'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par gses pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byinas/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur// longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / ru
124b1(mdo): sa myi g.yem par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na yang / ma dang bu dang / chung ma la yang su yang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta bar myi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/
124b2(mdo): longs spyod mi bar 'gyur/ longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / sru ba 'debs pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i nan tan gzung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni yang / de mang smras pa de bzhin byed de/ yid dam la btam
124b3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po bra ma'i tshig sangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ songs spyod che par 'gyur/ mongs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor myi byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyong pa ma
124b4(mdo): yang bsam pa 'thun pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor la thob bo// klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas spyi na pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod myi 'phrogs pa dang /
124b5(mdo): gzung ba'i tshig tu 'gyur/ btsun pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ya / 'khor ma mgu bar su yang myi 'gro'o// klu'i bdag po tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/
124b6(mdo): longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / mnyan pa de 'om pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// ji ches pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i lha dab spyod pa na yang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa la yang mkhas par 'gyur ro//
124b7(mdo): klu'i bdag po ban ba sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ yongs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po la de'i sems 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
124b8(mdo): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ya pa/ rgya chen po la yang mos shing dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod kyi 'phrogs pa
124b9(mdo): dang / mdzes pa dang / skyes po mang po dga' zhing med du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa pyod pa na yang / thogs pa myed pa'i blo dang / thogs pa myed pa'i sems dang / dbang po ma tshang ba myed par 'gyur ro//
125a1(mdo): klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod myi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag par lta ba'i khyim du skye'o// byang chub sems
125a2(mdo): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / byang chub sems bskyed pa dang / myi bral bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di
125a3(mdo): dag sbyin pa rgyan na/ 'byor da pa chen por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las lam 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don tu smon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi/
125a4(mdo): 'di dag nyid bzod pas brgyan na mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan na/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
125a5(mdo): chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gis brgyan na/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / dka' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyan na/ lta
125a6(mdo): ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'jom par 'gyur ro// byams pas ba rgyan na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba myed pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong bar 'gyu
125a7(mdo): dga' bas brgyan na/ zhum pa skyed pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyis brgyan na/ rjes su chags pa dang / lo khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed/
125a8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na/ lus dang / tshor ba dang sems dang chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i spong bas rgyan na/ myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad
125a9(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pas brgyan na/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / rmongs pa myed pa dang / sems las
125b1(mdo): su rung ba la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams da sakhas par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyan na// rdzib byed cing dbul ba dang / nyes pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyar na/
125b2(mdo): chos thams cad yang dag pa'i la pa bzhin du 'ong du chud par 'gyur ro// lam gis brgyan na/ yang dag pa mi la zhes 'grub par 'gyur ro// ni gnas kyis brgya dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// lpag mthong/
125b3(mdo): gis brgyan na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dang ye shes su 'gyur ro// thams kyis brgyan na/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po mdor na dge ba'i bcu'i
125b4(mdo): las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kyi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargya dra 'thob pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chom thams cad kyi bar dag 'thob pa /
125b5(mdo): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bas na dge ba bcu'i las/ kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher rnam par dbye bas brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis/ shig/ klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa la gnas pa'i grong
125b6(mdo): dang thong khyer dang grong das dang / snongs dang sras 'khor dang / chus bzang 'tshamams cad dang / dang / deng shes pa dang / smadadang / gas pas thams cad dang / mas kyisathamathams cad dang /
125b7(mdo): gi tshogs thams cad dang 'byung ba'i tshigs thams cad dang / me tog thasas cad bskyed pa dang / sro kob rgyab 'thung ba de dag das ni sa yin no// klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge sa bcu'i sas kyi sam rnams kyang da kyi ng+ge ba'i
125b8(mdo): thob pa dang kyi thos pa'i 'bras pa rnyed pa dang / nyan mas da shA rgyas kyi byang chub dang / sangs rgyas dang / rgya chub ses sa dpa'i grod pamasas cad byin mim sa zhum man//
125b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bu la nas/ klu'i bdag po rgyamamo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / sA dang rtsi dang lAm yin dadri bar bcas pa'i 'dzin
126a1(mdo): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho//
126a2(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya man 'du bri ri pa ri bring tshan ma ma ga yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdor/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
126a3(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ kun nas mdzes pa'i khang bzangs na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
126a4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / gdul bya 'bum phrag du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i khri ya sku myi g.yo bar bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
126a5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla kos 'phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas/ pa'i lha ba sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
126a6(mdo): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nas chen po gang gis gdul bya bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
126a7(mdo): bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mur 'gram du 'gyur ba'i bsod nas chen po ni ji lta bu/ tshad ni ji tsam zhig lags/ de skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ro//
126a8(mdo): 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang ngo to// 'jam dpal bsod nams chen po gang gis gdul bya bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sur 'gram du 'gyur
126a9(mdo): kha'i bsod nams chen po de ni shes rab las byung ba snying rje chen pos yong su bzlos pa/ thabs la mkhas pa chen po smon lam gyis bskyed pa/ tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzi rang shi nga tu nam par dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par
126b1(mdo): kyis yang dag par grub pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsas kyis kyi khyab pa yin no// 'jam dpas 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/
126b2(mdo): la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po nyid brgyad sbyar pas gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de'i rin po che
126b3(mdo): sna bdun ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud myed rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po me dang bdun no// de sa su
126b4(mdo): dpa' btus phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa ro lang gi sde rab tu 'jom par byed pa stong yod do// 'jam dpal re ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin/
126b5(mdo): no// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sem sa can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa la/ sems can de dag thams cad
126b6(mdo): kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid stong du bsgyur pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur pa te/ de ltar lnga'i dbang po brgya byin ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing / mthu che ba yin no// 'jam dpa
126b7(mdo): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur dal/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams
126b8(mdo): kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag du mar ba spur pas/ gang 'dod pa'i khas su bstan pa go bar byed pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug bdung du gyur te/ de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug bdud ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing / mthu che ba ste/
126b9(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba chu dus myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems cad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams
127a1(mdo): kyi phung po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur pas/ kang 'jig rten gyi khams stong byams pas khyab par byed pa/ stong gi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpas
127a2(mdo): stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin
127a3(mdo): ba/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur pas/ gang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed pa/ stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gnyis
127a4(mdo): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pas/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang
127a5(mdo): yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag tu mar bsgyur/ pas/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byam/ sa pas khyab par byed pa/ tshangs pa stong gsub gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig
127a6(mdo): rten gi dbang phyug chen po che bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ bar gyi bskal pa la nges par char 'bab cing / chu'i thigs pa rnams 'bab ste/ de dag gis stong
127a7(mdo): gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus gang bar byed de/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar chus gang bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thams cad kyang dbang phyug chen po che bar tshangs pa des myi shes pa myed de/ dbang phyug
127a8(mdo): chen po che ba tshangs pa'i mthu la ltos// de ltar ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che la mthu che ba yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po tshangs par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam
127a9(mdo): dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da la/ sems can de dag
127b1(mdo): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur bas/ nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum/
127b2(mdo): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyan thos chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur pa la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod
127b3(mdo): nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur pas/ rang sangs rgyas mthu chen po thob pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la re shig zhog gi// 'jam dpal sangs
127b4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas mthu chen pob pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par gyur da la/ sems can de dag thams
127b5(mdo): cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po// de nyid 'bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur bas/ byang chub se// mas dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal nam
127b6(mdo): mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/ sems can sgo ba las skyes pa dang / mangs nas skye sa pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang
127b7(mdo): gzugs can dang / gzugs cam ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes byed 'du shes byed byin gyi sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bya ba chub sems dpa' srid pa tham pa'i sam
127b8(mdo): nams kyi phub po dang ldar bar gyur dpa/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod rnams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bskur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chus
127b9(mdo): klu'i khung bu gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpas spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung /
128a1(mdo): gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe' byad gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad
128a2(mdo): bzang po rgyad bcu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar bsgyur da pas
128a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la ri mos mtshon pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ri mos mtshon pa brgyad bcu re re nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthis la 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/
128a4(mdo): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / 'phreng ba dang / lcags kyu dang / gcod pan dang / dbyig to dang / bum pa dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / stag dang / chu srin ma ka ra dang / nya dang nus sAl dang / rma bya dang /
128a5(mdo): ka la bying ka dang / shang shang de'u dang / tsan dang / dud pa dang / ne tso dang / rang pa dang / thi ba dang / nas dang / sman chen po dang / 2dod zho dang / ba men dang / klu dang / ra dang / khyu mchog dang / ri dang
128a6(mdo): shing bil ba dang / ri dgas nag po dang / noram bu rin po che dang / 8la kri mchog dang / rdo rje dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung thung nga/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gzhol dang / dgra sta dang / gtun
128a7(mdo): shing dang / zhags pa dang / gru bo che dang / mu tig gi 'breng ba dang / smin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / chu lnga dang / 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi bzang dang / nor sbyin dang / drang srong
128a8(mdo): chen po dang / dpal dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mye dang / rlung dang / pad ma dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / bkra shis dang / khri bstan bzang po dang / me long dang / rdzas pa dang / rtswa rur pa dang / bu ro rje sha dang /
128a9(mdo): khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rnga dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / dadu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / gdub 'khor dang / sor rngub dang / rna cha phyang 'phrul can dang / me tog bzang po dang / dpag bsams shing dang / 'khon
128b1(mdo): so'i dbus kyi seng ge ste/ ri mos mtshon pa brgyad bcu po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal ri mos mtshon pa brgyad bcur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin
128b2(mdo): ba bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma ma bsgyu pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis re tshe
128b3(mdo): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par 'grub ste/ 'di lta ste/ dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / dbu skra mthon ting gsas su 'khyil cing lung lo can dang / 'phral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa dang / sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod
128b4(mdo): spus legs par brgyan pa dang / ba'i lta bu'i rdzi ma mthon thing phra ba dang ldan pa'i spyan dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems dkar ba dang /
128b5(mdo): 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / lcags shin tu ring zhing srab pa/ dang / ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar ru zheng gang pa dang / s+phu re re nas skye ba dang / sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang /
128b6(mdo): 'amadoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / brla legs par zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyi rgyal po e ne sa'i lta bu dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yang sa pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam zhing gzhon pa chags pa dang
128b7(mdo): phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi so mo ring ba dang / zhabs sdong mo'i tshigs kyi mngon pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / dpung 'gro shi nang tu thum pa dang / bdun mtho ba dang / thal kong /
128b8(mdo): rgyas pa dang / bkas pa zab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dang / ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lbang slebs pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang 'bas kyi mthis/ 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa
128b9(mdo): sma skad de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal skyes bu chen po'i mngan sum bcu rtsa gnyis su gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bsod
129a1(mdo): nams kyi phung po de nyid grangs myed par bsgyur ba dang / bsam gyis myi khyab par bsgyur ba dang / dpag tu myed par bsgyur ba dang / brjod du myed par bsgyur ba dang / brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i bar/
129a2(mdo): du bsgyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mu 'gram gdul bya'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ des gdul bya'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gyi zhams tshad myed grangs myed pa gsung smras go bar mdzad
129a3(mdo): do// gsung smras ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyis kyang de bzhin no// skus kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de ltar bsod nams chen po de ni/ shes rab chen po las byung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgom pa/ thabs la mkhas
129a4(mdo): pa chen po dang / smon lam gyis bskyed pa/ tshul khrims dang / nge 'dzind rnam par dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par grub pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis kyi
129a5(mdo): khyab pa yin no// bsod nams chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'i chos kyi mur 'gram gyis gdul bya'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa ra byed do// 'jam dpal rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
129a6(mdo): kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// rgyu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi dbang dang / gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis te/ 'jam dpal rgyu
129a7(mdo): de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ gsung sgra yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no//
129a8(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mtshan yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos bstan pa/
129a9(mdo): yang khyad par 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'od kyang khyad par 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od khyad par 'phags pa ji lta ba de bzhin
129b1(mdo): du spyod pa yang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan thams cad kyis rgyas pa yin te/ 'jam dpal kha tog dang dbyibs dang spyod pa'i bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can 'dul bar 'gyur
129b2(mdo): ba'i kha dog dang ldan dbyibs dang / spyod pa'i bye brag de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal mtshan gyi bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan gyi bye brag de dang
129b3(mdo): de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can nas la gzugs kyi su go mang to// 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par 'gyur ba'i chos bstar pa de dang des de bzhin gshegs pa chom ston par/
129b4(mdo): sems can rnams kyis zhes so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang gis re/ mas can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'dug pa dang 'dul ra 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa gnas par sems
129b5(mdo): can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs// pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung // na/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig
129b6(mdo): rten la snying brtse ba dang / swa dang myi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir 'byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ pra
129b7(mdo): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i spa ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi ston pa myi mnyam
129b8(mdo): ba mnyam pa/ gang zag bla ma mchis pa/ khams gsum na mgon po'i mchog/ sems cad thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis myi baspyod pa/ nam mkha' ltar myi gos pa/ bsam gyis/
129b9(mdo): gyi khyab pa/ bsam par 'os pa/ lha 'tshal ba bstan sdug pa 'di 'dra ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa sogs so// bcom ldan
130a1(mdo): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / sgra dang
130a2(mdo): myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dring zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i/
130a3(mdo): mdo'o// rdzogs so// rgyag ra gi sakhan po phrang nya bar ma dang / bu rkyen gyi lo rtsa ba bar de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtanas phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ma n+ya rang
130a4(mdo): li pa ri prid tsha na ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin cen dra ba can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
130a5(mdo): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ya/ ngas pa can/ spre'u rdzing gyi 'gram na/ khang pa gartsegs pa'i gar/ sa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te
130a6(mdo): byams pa las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gi sa thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa rnams dang skye ba gsum gyis thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba bzhis thogs pa
130a7(mdo): rnams dang / skye ba lngas thogs pa rnams dang / skye ba bcus thogs pa rnams dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba stong gis bar rnams kyis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
130a8(mdo): dang / dgra bcom pa bye ba drug bcu dang / lA bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sna'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / myi mjed gi
130a9(mdo): bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu shi nang tu dpal bzang ldan dang / lha'i Ta zla ba'i 'od dang / lha'i bu nyi ma'i 'od dang / lha'i bu grags pa'i tog dang / lnga'i bu mngon par dga' ba dang / de dag dang gzhan dang lha bye ba phrag
130b1(mdo): dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / klu'i rgyas po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgyam co dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bcung dang / klu'i rgyal po btang
130b2(mdo): bzung chen po dang / sA ma yin gyi dbang po smu ga can dang / snu ma yin gi dbang po thams cad kyi 'khor dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po sangs pa can na/ sde dpon seng ge'i bu li ma byi stobs mtha' yas zhes/
130b3(mdo): bya ba zhig gnas so// de'i tshe seng ge'i bu stobs mtha' yas de'i gzho nu yi tsha byi rin cen dra ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas mang po 'bum la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos kyi tshul snang ba mtha' yas pa'i smon ma dang ldan pa yang
130b4(mdo): dag par 'dzin pa na chod lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba zhig gnyid log ste/ de'i rmyi lam du rgyas pa/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan ni gnas nas babs nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul te/ mngon par smras
130b5(mdo): pa/ sems can snying po rgyal sangs rgyas kyis/ stong gsum 'a jig rten snang bar mdzad nas bzhugs// bsod nams brgyab/ sogs gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// bdag nyid chen po gzugs kyis
130b6(mdo): ma lus mdzes// dkyil 'khor bye ba rab tshar gang yin pa// zla ba stong ngam yang dbye ba'i// 'od gzer gang gis dkyil 'khor de snang byed ji ltar gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor bye bar tshad
130b7(mdo): bar ni// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor mchog ni snang byed cing // de bzhin sgo phyogs de bzhin nub phyogs dang // de bzhin byang phyogs dkyil 'khor mchog snang byed// 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad spu'i khung re re nas ni 'od gzer
130b8(mdo): gang dag 'thung ri med pa ni 'od 'thung de dag gis// bla ni dkyis 'khor thams cad chog mog mdzad // kun gzigs rnams kyi spu'i khung re re nas// 'od gzer 'byung zhing spu lung re re nas// 'od ga zer 'byung ba rnams kyis dang
130b9(mdo): ka'i klung // drug bcum drug kyi rnyed dadags sa mdzad// de nas yim byigan du mi che na bcan/ de'i tshan po 'das nas/ mgobs mtha' mas la smram pa// yang sa dang sum pa'i bu yongs su dga' thar// dpa
131a1(mdo): ldan gi gnas nas babs nas/ bdag la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul ba bgyis par gyur da to// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du/ yab la bdag gsol ba bgyid
131a2(mdo): do// de nas li tsha byi gzho nu rin cen dra ba can gyis/ pha stobs mtha' yas la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems can kun gyi ded dpon rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jig rten mkhas pa bsam yas bdag nyid che// skyob pa de la khyod
131a3(mdo): kyis mchod don mdzod// 'dren pa de ni 'jig rten 'byung bar dka'// ji ltar u dum ba ra'i me tog skye ba ni// mdog ldan mdzes shing shi nad tu dri zhim la// dri ngad ldang zhing rdul bcom nyon mongs myed// de 'dra'i me tog mchog ni rnyed
131a4(mdo): par dka'// de phyir yab la bdag gis gsol 'debs pa// de ni dgyes pa'i thugs kyis bdag la gnod // gang zhig 'jig rten 'gon po 'od mdzad pa// don dam gzigs pa la ni mchod pa bgyid// li tsa byi
131a5(mdo): stobs mtha' yas sems dga' bas// li tsa byi seng ge zhes bya ba/ sa smras pa// sde dpon rgyal ba la ni mchod mdzod de// bdag gi/ gzho nu bstan la gnas par mdzod// 'dren pa shag kya seng ge mchod pa
131a6(mdo): dang / gzho nu mchog gi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ khyim pa bye ba drug bcu brtson par gyur // brgya byin lA myig stong dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug dbang spur lha// bdud kyi bu bo ded dpon mang po dang // bye ba sa'i lha
131a7(mdo): dang lhan cig tu// yangs pa can gyi dga' bar thams cad zhugs// gser las byas dang de bzhin rdul gyi khri// bye ba phrag ni stong du chang ba dag/ rin chen bdun gyis de dag mdzes byas pas/ re re yang ni bye ba stong du chang // khri
131a8(mdo): g.yas dang g.yon du rin po che// rin chen sna bdun rgyal mtshan bzang po btsugs// khri re'i tshad ni dpag tshad rangs par yod// rgyal mtshan dag kyang dpag tshad bye bar mtho// rgyal mtshan rnams kyi g.yas dang g.yod du ni// de'i
131a9(mdo): drung dpag tshad pas mtho stegs bu dang / rang bzhin gcig ste nor bu rin po ma// bye ba las byas dpag tshad mthong bar 'phags// khri'i bar bar lha'i ba dan yang // dpag tshad pas kyang ring ba sha stag sbyangs// ba dan
131b1(mdo): lnga ldi gser gi dra ba dag/ dril bu g.yer ka dag gis mdzes par byas// khri rnams kyi ni 'og tu ka ba yang // bye ba phrag stong bya ba legs par sbya da// gang gis 'di ru khri mchog de dag ni/ brtan par byas pa sgo gtan bcu/
131b2(mdo): pa bzhin// khri'i steng du gser las byas pa dang / gser sta bu dang rdul dang bye dur+ya// de bzhin shes dang spug dang / rdo snying dang / de bzhin rtsa ba dang ni khong pa nas// byung ba myin pa'i mu tig ka dug dag byas// tsan dan
131b3(mdo): shin tu dmar pos dmar bas bskus// re re dag ni bye ba stong du tshang // khri rnams dang ni khri la chu lta bu'i// mkha' rten dag kyang byas nas de la ni// gser gyi dra ba dang ni kaser lta bu// dngul dang bye tu r+ya dang de bzhin shel// spug
131b4(mdo): dang de bzhin rdo'i snying po'i// mkha' rten so so byas nas de la ni// drin cen dI la sma shi nad tu snyan pa btags// rnam 'dren sma ni rnam par grags pa'i// mchod pa'i don du bdug pa rab tu bzhag/ yangs pa can gyi
131b5(mdo): steng gi bar snang la/ gser gyi skud pa las byas bla re bres/ gser gi srud pa re re mchog tu bzang / rin cen chun 'phyang stong phrag bye ba yang // mu tig rgyan 'phreng stong phrag bye ba yang // re re ga ser las
131b6(mdo): byas pa'i skud pas brgyus// yangs pa'i grong khyer gnas pa'i li byi// gang dag gang du 'do ba der nyams dgal// de tshes ni skyes bu ba dun srid g.yogs// grong khyer yangs pa kun tu ras yug bkram/
131b7(mdo): dra ba can gyis tsan dan dmar btags nas// ras rnams la ni legs par bslu ba byas// bye ba stong phrag bdun btsu'o sal snyan dag/ rnam pa stong rnams g.yas kyi phyogs nas 'khrol// g.yon phyogs su'ang bye
131b8(mdo): ba bdun nu stong / shug kya seng ge'i mchod pa'i don tu brtsom// de 'dra'i bkod chen byas nas li tsa bi// gzho nu pra ba can gyis de'i tshe// dga' ba'i sems kyis pha ma la smras pa// sangs rgyas spyan drang skad du bdag
131b9(mdo): mchi'o// grong khyer mchog nas mkhas pa de byung ste/ rgyal bdag chen po gas par song nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho la zhabs la mgo za 'as/ phyag 'tshal der ni gzho nu phyog gcig 'dug/ de nas i tsa
132a1(mdo): gzho chu rin cen dra ba can yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
132a2(mdo): gcig tu 'dug nas/ li ma bi gzho nu rin cen dra ba can de la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'dug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang
132a3(mdo): dag par rab tu dag ba mdzad do// de nas li tsa bi gzho chu rin cen dra ba can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud
132a4(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bco ma ldan 'das ras dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bdag gi der ka dugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis l-i tsa bi gzho nu rin
132a5(mdo): cen dra ba can la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ cang myi gsung bar gyurd pa gnang ngo // de nas li tsa bi gzho nu rin cen dra ba can/ btso/ ma ldan 'das kyis cang myi gsung bar gyur da pas gnang bar rig nas
132a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas li tsa bi kazho nu rin cen dra ba can lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i
132a7(mdo): bu dpal bzang ldan dang lhan cig tu yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por zhugs so// spro ba dang dka' ba'i gzugs rnams kyis zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i rnam pa sbyor du bcug go// sbyar nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang / bdan
132a8(mdo): bshams shing yangs pa can legs par brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
132a9(mdo): li tsa bi gzho nu rin cen dra ba can kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshong bab ste/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na gdugs chod lags te/ dus la bab pa lags so// de
132b1(mdo): nas bcom ldan 'das pa rdo'i nus kyis srad gson sa dang / chos gom gsos srung bzed gnams te/ dge slong gi dge btsun dpag tu myed pa dang 'bas gcig tu steng gi bar snang la gyi bdun gyi srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/
132b2(mdo): yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// bskyod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul da
132b3(mdo): g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur nyung/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/ ltas
132b4(mdo): bco brgyad dang ldan pa rnam pa drug bcu g.yos so// gzhan yang cho 'phrul bye ba sa ya brgya phrag ston cing yangs pa can du gshegs so// de'i tshe lha bye ba sa ya brgya phrag stong du ma lho'i me tog ud pa la dang /
132b5(mdo): pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po rnams dang / !/ 'i rin po che las byas pa'i me tog rnams dang / lha'i a ka ru'i phye / ma dang / rin po che'i phye ma dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser dang
132b6(mdo): lho'i rin po che'i phye ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor ro// lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag wA ga phrag 'bum mngon par rab tu dkrol to// lha'i rgyan dpag tu myed
132b7(mdo): pa rnams kyis brgyan to// steng gi bar snangs can dam dmar po shing rtul srog zhing tsam gyi char gyi rgun phab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das li tsa bi gzho nurin cen dra ba can gi gnas ga pa der gshegs te byon nas
