174b7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun brjod// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmyi lam na'ang mngon par zhen pas dmyigs par smra bar myi 'byung ngo // gang dag tshig su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul
174b8(mdo): 'di thos nas/ mos pa dang gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod// da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa bzhin du/ de dag kyang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // de nas
174b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying thos
175a1(mdo): nas/ myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang chung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dzim
175a2(mdo): mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tsom du gyur pa nges par bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/ de bzhin
175a3(mdo): gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab tu gnas pas de dag gi the tsom thams cad kyang rab tu btsal cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pa de lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la skabs
175a4(mdo): phye na/ chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid cung zad cig / bdag zhu'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni myi chags pa'i ye shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog
175a5(mdo): ma lags pa mkhyen pa ye shes sa mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes te/ mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bcom ldan la/ ras ni ror mkhyen pa ste/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la
175a6(mdo): mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi dus mkhyen pa ste/ chod las myi ra' zhing phyad par lung stom pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchong mkhyend pa ste/ sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos stom pa/ bcom
175a7(mdo): ldan 'das ni rnam par rol pa ste/ mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
175a8(mdo): kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug ltar myi mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni zil kyis ma non pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
175a9(mdo): na dpa' bo gcig po/ bcom ldan 'das mi rang byung ba ste/ spobs dpon myed par chos thams cad rang gis mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa myed pa dang / lam ngan par
175b1(mdo): thugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu sgribs pa dang / shind tu sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang bas/
175b2(mdo): bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag yul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa a phye nad pa la mkhas
175b3(mdo): shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni myi 'jigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mkhyen
175b4(mdo): pa la mkhas pa/ sgra dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyamagaseng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes
175b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul pa da patsa co mya mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la
175b6(mdo): gnas pa ste/ zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i blo dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ nam mazha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rje chen
175b7(mdo): po la gnas pa ste/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal bas myi skyob/ sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang
175b8(mdo): mnyam pa ste/ bsam pa'i ye shes gnyis su myed pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni bye phrag myed pa ste/ nam mtha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa myed
175b9(mdo): pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang bral ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyend cing thams cad gzigs pa spyad lnga'i tshul gyis yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan
176a1(mdo): 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang / chos dang me zhes rad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa ma rig nas/ chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas shing chos la rjes su bgyi ba dang
176a2(mdo): ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas/ chos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o// de skad ces gsol
176a3(mdo): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces kas lang to// legs so legs so skyes rung ba ji ltar khyod gang ka'i klung kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom
176a4(mdo): ldan 'das rnams so rnas pa rnams sung bstan pa thob pa/ rigs kyi mu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa sa dris zhig dang / rmiH pa dang de dang de nyid lung bskur 'as ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//
176a5(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'gro dar 'dus par gyur to// 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la/
176a6(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshe gas pa la zhu bar 'dod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
176a7(mdo): chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gang rnams sems dpasems la sems yid mtshungs// shi na tu bsam sems ye shes mnyam la gnas// sems la sems myed par ni zhugs
176a8(mdo): pa'i tshul// de dag don tu rgyal la bdag zhu'o// snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma myed// yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pa/ nges byas rnam par thar da pa lag bzhag pa// de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu/ bdag la bdag
176a9(mdo): myed shin tu rnam dag yid// sems can ron zhugs sems can myed la dga'// sems can bdag myed gnyis kyi las byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'dri'o// cho ga spyod pa brtul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsam pa dag
176b1(mdo): cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra// srun po lta bur brtan zhing myi g.yo ba// de dag ched du yon tan mdzad la zhu// myi bzlogs brtan pa brtson 'grus kun las bzang // dpa' bo bdud kyi dkra'i nga rgyal bcom// nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs
176b2(mdo): dridri skyong ba// mthong dga'i de dag don tu 'di zhu'o// thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtsor 'grus dga'// bsam gtan rnam tharang shes rab mchog tu gyur // mngon shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od// rab dag rwa myed don bdag
176b3(mdo): zhu'o// stong pa mtshan ma myed cing / myi smon gnas bsam bzhin shi 'pho dang ni skye ba ston// skyes pa myed cing myi gnas 'chi 'pho myed// de dag don tu myi'i spyod pa zhu/ nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis// rtogs par dga' zhing zab mo/
176b4(mdo): mthong dga' ba/ skye bo kun gyi yid rnams skul ba yi chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs pa la zhu/ legs par byas pa'i rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'// chos la chos myed 'dzin pa gnyis las grol// rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la
176b5(mdo): dga'/ sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i don tu lu// gang dag sa dngas rgyas rigs gnas chos la dgal// rtag tu sangs rgyas bstod pa kun myed blo// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos/ yon tan
176b6(mdo): rgya mtsho de'i phyir 'di zhu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gso lang to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal ngag sbyi
176b7(mdo): ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags// tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan nam mazhal dang mtshungs pa dang / shes
176b8(mdo): rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / ye shes nam mtha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su drang ba dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun
176b9(mdo): rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / myi bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sku rjes su dran pa dang myi bral ba rnams lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa thob
177a1(mdo): cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod de/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang
177a2(mdo): mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas/ sems can
177a3(mdo): thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags// mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang
177a4(mdo): bgyid pa rnams lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shind tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la
177a5(mdo): mkhas pa ste/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba'i thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid/ dbyer myed pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ chos kyi
177a6(mdo): dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhos pa rnams lags// bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing myi
177a7(mdo): g.yo ba rnams lags// sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing / rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ gzungs thob pa rtag tu myi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags// spobs pa thogs pa myed cing rgyun myi 'chang
177a8(mdo): la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byid kyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pa rnams lags/ skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags// bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das
177a9(mdo): shing/ bdud dang / phyir rgos pa thams cad bcom pa rnams lags/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chad byed pa bstsags shing / sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas
177b1(mdo): rnams ma byang yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnamasas nye bar gnas pa rnams lags// rgyam tsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la gyi chags pa rnams
177b2(mdo): lags// chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nam mkha' la rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang / ldan pa rnams lags// cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang / mun pa dang / bral zhing snang
177b3(mdo): ba thob pa rnams lags/ gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog cing / rang byung gi ye shes shi na tu rtogs pa rnams lags// myur du theg pa chen po la/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes 'di 'thob par 'gyur lags/
177b4(mdo): de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mtha' mdzod la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so//
177b5(mdo): legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don/ 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyod na sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i mashes
177b6(mdo): gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po go cha bgos pa/ bgrang ba las 'ang sa pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos
177b7(mdo): tshol bas myi ngoms pa/ ye shes kyi mchoms can/ nga rgyal kyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad sas yang dag par
177b8(mdo): 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i/ sems kyis thams cad mkhye nang pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no//
177b9(mdo): de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod legs par rab tu nyonas zung shig/ ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan 'di rnams dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur bshad do//
178a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi
178a2(mdo): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug
178a3(mdo): pa dang / sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag pas byang chub rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang
178a4(mdo): mtshungs pa yin no// des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin pa de ste na te/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ngang 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ pa'i mi 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rgyu rnam par dag par
178a5(mdo): sbyin pa de sbyin/ sa ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin// rnam par sbyin pa la myi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin
178a6(mdo): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin no// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' myed pa bzhin du sems mtha' myed par byas
178a7(mdo): te/ sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing bsgribs pa myed pa de bzhin du byang chub du bsngos te/ sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs myed pa de bzhin du gzugs thams la myi gnas par sbyin pa de
178a8(mdo): sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba myed pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin pa/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes myed pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa myed par sbyin pa de sbyin
178a9(mdo): ltar nam mkha' la 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du/ 'dus byas thams cad myed par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa myed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa myi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji
178b1(mdo): sa rgyab kyi sa cad marnam pa de banim thathams can thams padas byams pas khyab par smin pa de byed/ rjes padas pa' gyi 'ang pa de bzhin na/ dgam mchog sa sum gachis
178b2(mdo): gyi 'ang bar bsngo zhing mun bu sbyin/ jis ranam mkha' ma mun pabyed pa de bzhin du nyor mongs pa thams cad kyi mud pa byed par phyin pa de phyid/ jiltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rab 'a
178b3(mdo): yongs su dag par smon pa de phyir/ ji sa nam mkha' sems can thams cad kyi go zhabs 'byed pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams can nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji lam nam mkha' la nga'i bskyed pa de bzhin du sa
178b4(mdo): can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bar smin pa de sbyin/ ji sngar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de sbyin pa de lta bur rnam par gyi tog cing yun gyis grub ste/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing
178b5(mdo): chos thams cad la re ba myed pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dang / 'asbyin pa de sbyin te/ rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba
178b6(mdo): de ni shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad myi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i seMs
178b7(mdo): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag la mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur da te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di
178b8(mdo): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
178b9(mdo): dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam par byed pa ste/ rnam par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa chos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rnam pa se/ ye shes rnam par dag pa/
179a1(mdo): shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag pa sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems kyi rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gi rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa/ gzugs myed pa gzugs su ston pa
179a2(mdo): dang myi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mun pa myed cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig pas mtshan ma myed pa'i mthar gyur pa/ mthar phyi nad pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ myi zad/
179a3(mdo): pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyend pa'i lung bstan pa thob pa/ mtshams bcad cing / byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing / dbang
179a4(mdo): bskur ba thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhug sa shing mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par spyod pa legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes
179a5(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de dag gi skyo da yul te/ skyes bu dam pa de dang de dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri
179a6(mdo): drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa la skyes so// de nas bcom 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ka sungs so// dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin/ byang chub
179a7(mdo): phyir te rnam sbyin yongs myi 'dod// dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung myed do// rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin// mkhas pas chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas su// lus dang srog la 'ang chags par myi 'gyur/
179a8(mdo): zhing // de dag la ni rnams kyang 'dzin pa myed// de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges/ thams cad btang yang myi dga' myi 'gyur zhing // de la zhum pa myed de gong ba myed// de'i sa nam mkha' mtshungs
179a9(mdo): par chos rnams bsgoms// de bas dga' bar myi 'gyur zhum pa 'ang myed// bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag/ byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin// de ni sems kyi rgyud la myi chags
179b1(mdo): bar// smom pamyed par sdom pa rab tu s+ho// sems mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtong // rab 'bring ba ma gsum yang myed par sbyin// bsam pa yongs dag dri ma myed pa yis// thams
179b2(mdo): cad gtong nam bur sbyin gyi 'dod lus dngache ni b+hi rta ka smra ma 'dra// lo ngas spyod rgyalam thog bzhin snying po khyed// 'jig rten kun la snying rje rtse bskyed nas// 'jig rten chos kyis myi gos sbyin pa sbyin// nyon mongs
179b3(mdo): dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong // rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste// bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags myi rnyed// de ltar brtags na thams cad gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba
179b4(mdo): yin zhes gsungs// de la rab tu gnas nas tshul khrims na// nus khrims yon tan gnas rnam bsam gtan med/ ma gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin rje ma
179b5(mdo): bas sems rab tshim// nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir myi ste// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par gsungs/ na dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu// sbyin gtong nyon mongs
179b6(mdo): spang zhing dge ba'i phyir/ des na 'dzin pa la ni chags myi 'gyur// pha rol ston spongs phyir ni myi gtong ste// bdag blo nam dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo // ji ltar ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong /
179b7(mdo): de sgra des ni byang chub yon tan mthong // dzi lA ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong // de ste de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179b8(mdo): po rnam mkha' mdzod la bka' sa la pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chus rnams rnam mtha' dang batshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'dis ste gzu
179b9(mdo): can la bu'i yul mnyam pa nyid dang / zag sa sa bu'i lha mnyam pa nyid dang / sku ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi 'o dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sem
180a1(mdo): dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/ brgyad gang zhen 'dis ste/
180a2(mdo): sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang myi 'bral ba dang / chad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myed pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir bslab pa thams cad
180a3(mdo): myi 'dor ba dang / smon sam yongs su dag pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad du myi 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir smod pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu sngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su dag
180a4(mdo): pa'i phyir kun nas gdung ba myed pa dang / byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su brjod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang tshul
180a5(mdo): khrims yongs su dag pa ni nam mkha' dag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o// nam mkha' dri ma myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang dri ma myed pa'o// nam mkha' zhi ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang zhi ba'o// nam
180a6(mdo): mkha' myi mthong ste/ tshul khrims de yang myi mtho ba'o// nam ma 'a myi dmal ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang myi dma' ba'o// nam mkha' ba zung du myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang gzung du myed pa'o// nam mkha'
180a7(mdo): gnas myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang gnas myed pa'o// nam mkha' myed pa ma yin te/ tshul khrims de yang myed pa ma yin pa'o// nam mkha' rtag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rtag pa'o// nam mkha' myi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims
180a8(mdo): de yang myi zad pa'o// nam ka mtshan ma myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang mtshan ma myed pa'o// nam mkha' rgyu ba myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang sgru ba myed pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang spros pa
180a9(mdo): myed pa'o// nam mkha' zad pa myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang 'ad la myed pa'o// nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' myi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang
180b1(mdo): 'gyur ba'o// nam mkha' rnam par myi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rnam par myi rtog pa'o// nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang thams cad du song ba'o// nam mkha' myi chod myi phyed pa ste/ tshul
180b2(mdo): khrims de yang kyi chod myi phyed pa'o// nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o// nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rang
180b3(mdo): bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
180b4(mdo): pa 'di dag gsungs so// semasa'i tshul khrims dri myedadang zhing gdung ba myed lus dang sems kyang rnam par dag dag yi thams cad bsdam mnyas pa rtag tu na nga'i tshul khrims dregs
180b5(mdo): myi snyems// blo 'chang sems la myi gnas byang chub sem/ sa la rton// las gang ma byas ma bsams de bzhin ma brtag/ sa te/ de ni dmar sngo ser myin kha dog gzugs myi gnas// gzug
180b6(mdo): myed myin bden myi g.yo bden pa nam mkha' bzhin// tshul khrims lta ba'i gnas myed mkhas pa kun gyi bsngags// tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi/ zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar
180b7(mdo): ston pa// gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul khrims brten// de bas tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa pa yi ga ni// gags su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes bya// yo byad bsrungs
180b8(mdo): shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems sbyangs pa// tshul khrims de yi gnas des sems rkang tha rad pa'i rten// de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thams cad sgrub// g.yo ba rlom sems kun dral
180b9(mdo): ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nam mkha' mtshung so mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin spyod // byang chub phyir nges myi gtong byang chub kun myi rtog/ gang ba las chos shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin//
181a1(mdo): 'phags pa nam mtha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po gnyis pa// / rigs kyi bu de ste ji ltar na
181a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa ni kha dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs
181a3(mdo): pa'i phyir gshe yang slar myi gshe ba dang / lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir bdegs kyang slar myi rtog pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spyos kyang slar myi spyo ba dang / bsam pa nam mtha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang
181a4(mdo): slar gyi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub se mas dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag
181a5(mdo): pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'gra/ sa pa myed de/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i bzod pa/ yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa myed de/ rnyed
181a6(mdo): pa dang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa myed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' nim snang ma
181a7(mdo): nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad par nyams myed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni bag la nyal thams cad spangs pa ste/ bag la nyal myed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni yid dang dmyigs pa
181a8(mdo): myed pa ste/ yid dang dmyigs pa myed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' nim skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa can gyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni gzugs dang gzugs myed pa thams
181a9(mdo): cad pa grub pa byams pas zab pa'i bzod pa sangs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'azod pa yongs su dag pa das ma'a' dang tshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
181b1(mdo): chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang nin 'di sa ste/ stong pa nyid la bzod kyang sa kha gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel pa ma yin pa dang / smon pa byed/
181b2(mdo): pa la bzod kyang / byang chub tu smon pa myed pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa la bzod kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba myed pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa/
181b3(mdo): dang / 'byung ba myed pa la bzod kyang skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang / sems can myed pa la bzod kyang dngos po rnams gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta bzhin bzod kyang dus rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/
181b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa'o// bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag bdag la gshe ya bzod do snyam pa de ni nga yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni nam
181b5(mdo): mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di ni gshe ba bzod / par bya'o snyam pa de ni ngar 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mazha'/ dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa' ma yin no// 'di dag ni yi ge bsngo pa'i//
181b6(mdo): snyam pa de ni smra dang skad kyis bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshung sa pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di yang stong pa bdag kyang stong pa'o snyam ba de ni/ yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang
181b7(mdo): mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// bdag gis 'bod par bya'o// snyam pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa de// do ma ma'a' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di lta ste dperan/ shings la chen po rig la ba yod par las/
181b8(mdo): zhig 'ongs te/ shings la bcad na dris 'ings la bcad pa'i lpag sa rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad do// bdag nis bcad do snyam du myi sems te/ de dag la rjes su chags pa yang byed/ grong khro ba yang byed de/ myi tog
181b9(mdo): bar gyi rtog yongs su myi rtog pa de bzhin du gang 'azod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam ma'a' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das ro'i me rigs su bcad ba 'di dag gsungs so// bang /
182a1(mdo): pa shes pa/ bzod pa myi zad gtsang / yid ni yul la ma chags shi nad tu bsgoms// phyi nang shin tu rnam dag myi gnas pa// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o// lus 'di gzugs
182a2(mdo): brnyan rtsa shing rtsig pa 'dra// sems kyang gzugs myed myi snang sgyu ma 'dra// chos 'di lta ba'i gnas myed nam mkha' bzhin/ lus kyang myi 'gyur yid la khro ba myed// bkur sti byed la dga' dang zhe sdang myed// mtho dang dma'
182a3(mdo): bar rnam par rtog pa myed// theg pa gag 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de// sems can dag pa brtan 'dir bzod smra yin// srog myed gang zag bdag myed sems can byed// chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang //
182a4(mdo): byed pa dang 'gal myi byed// de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog yang dag nyid// wa ngan zer ba'i tshig thos myi gshe zhing // byed pa myed pa nam mkha'i sprin smra ba zhin// bdag rnams bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong ste// bstan
182a5(mdo): 'dir sems can gtsang ma bzod smra yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182a6(mdo): chen po brtsor 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te bzhi gang zhen di sa ste/ dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad la brtsom yang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub par rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa
182a7(mdo): dang / rim ma byams ngan par 'a byed kyang / de bzhid gshegs pa rnams pas kyi mnyas ba ya dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / sems can yongs sa sbyin par bye nga / sems can rnas pa da sems pa gyi byed pa
182a8(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad byi la sa smra ba da kyang ba da ngags dang ma bar byam mas yang dag par de sas kyi yo te/ rigs kyi mam pani po da nga ldanan/ byang chum ma na gyi na 'grus
182a9(mdo): xxx
182b1(mdo): pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig des ma rmar rnam par brtags te myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gis sems ting nge 'dzinang gi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems de/ sems kyi chos nyid kyis
182b2(mdo): rnam par brtags te/ gyi dmyigs dang / brtsod 'grus gang gis pha rol btu phyi nad pa gyogs thams cad rab tu spad par byed kyang / de gcig nas gcig tu sems cad pa mi chos nyid kyis mi nad tu brtags te/ gyi dbyis
182b3(mdo): pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis bya chub kyi tshogs kyi chom thams cad yang dag par spru kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid du rnam par btags te/ yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba dang / brtsor 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas
182b4(mdo): kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te/ myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzind par byed de yang sgra brag cha dang mtshungs pa yang dag
182b5(mdo): par rjes su myi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi/ chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed pa'i mtsha/ na nyid du rnam par brtags nas myi dmyigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad
182b6(mdo): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
182b7(mdo): yongs su chad pa'i 'artson 'grus mo// de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni sras dang ngag dang sems rab tu ldan pa'o// yongs su cad pa'i brtson 'grus ni yin pa myed pa 'dor bgyed pa gnas pa byed pa ste/ nam byang chub sems
182b8(mdo): dpa' lus dang ngag dang sems sbyor ba'i 'artson 'grus ca ba nas kyi gnas pa ba zhin tu brtags nas kyi dmyigs shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'dug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub
182b9(mdo): sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rnam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// ji snyaman nam mkha' gzugs su myed cing sems can thams cad rab tu rtsa ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'artsod 'grus de yang chos thams cangs
183a1(mdo): myi gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed de/ ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab myed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang
183a2(mdo): sems can thams cad la ko skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang nags tshal dang lo tog skye yang rtsa ba myed cing gnas myed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de
183a3(mdo): yang sangs rgyas kyi chos zas cad bskyed kyang 'jig rten sa la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa myed do// ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus de yang
183a4(mdo): dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba'i gzugs tha dad par ston/ pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de yang ses
183a5(mdo): cadan thams cad dang chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa snga/ tshogs kun tu ston to// nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu ba// sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rjes su myi
183a6(mdo): mthong zhing gang la rtsom pa de yang rnam par brtags nas myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mchu ngas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
183a7(mdo): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyi mthu bskyed nas/ lus dang srog la 'ang 'phangs par myi byed cing / bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad pa spyod// sems can phan pa'i don byed phan sems pa'i// /
183a8(mdo): sngon gi srid par 'dus byas ji srid pa// byang chub phyir ni de srid 'khor// de dag skyo bar 'gyur ba yang yong byed de// phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu bskyed// seMs cad bsam gyi khyab pa 'grol bar brtsod// sangs rgyas bsam//
183a9(mdo): myi khyab pa mchod par brtson// zhing rnams bsam myi khyab pa lta bar brtson// bsam gyis myi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar brtson// sbyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab gtong bar brtson// tshul khrims bsam gyis myi khyab brtson
183b1(mdo): bzod pa bsam gyis myi khyab bsgom par brtson// brtson 'grus bsam gyis myi khyab dge bar brtson// bsam gtan bsam gyis myi khyab sems par brtson// shes rab bsam gyis myi khyab bsgom par brtson// byams pa/
183b2(mdo): bsam gyis myi khya ba bsgom par brtson// don dang yon tan bsgrub par rab tu brtson// srog dang lus kyang myi 'phangs brtson par byed// nyon mongs 'thab pa kun las rnam par grol// stong pa rnam tha ra da bdag myed mngon
183b3(mdo): par brtsod// bdag la bdag myed che ba'i bdag nyid bcom// sA las nam grol byang chub phyir yang spyod// sgyu ma smyig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson// sems myed sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob// g.yo ba myed pa'i chos rnams
183b4(mdo): stong par brtson// 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol// bshad cing klog pa la ni rtag tu brtson// chos dar chos myin gnyis las shin tu 'das// sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la brtson// 'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams /
183b5(mdo): sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med// sems can spyod pa/ rnams la 'ang mtha' myed de// mkhas pa de la brtag tu brtson 'grusasbyor// sems can spyod batha' byed la rab tu 'jug/ chos 'di
183b6(mdo): nams ni skye myed 'gog myed de/ mkhas pa de dag sems kyang kyi zhum zhing // phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen rab bskyed de// 'di 'dra'i tshi la sems can sdom du 'dzud/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
183b7(mdo): sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang 'jog la nang
183b8(mdo): du sems gnas par yang / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba dang / sems phyi rol nas kyang zlog la phyi rol du sems rgyu ba yang myi dmyigs pa dang / bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang ma
183b9(mdo): pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid de yang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mtha'
184a1(mdo): dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams gi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te/ bsam gtan//
184a2(mdo): myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang zhams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/
184a3(mdo): bsam gtan byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang rten pha rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan gyi byed pa dang / bsam gtan myi byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi
184a4(mdo): khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs myed pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
184a5(mdo): bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang nges par rtogs pa/ 'i sems ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtogs// pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ chos rnams la srid myi mthong myi dma'
184a6(mdo): myi stod myi stod par 'gyur ba myed pa/ rnam par myi rtog pa/ stsogs pa myed pa/ 'bri ba myed pa 'dzin pa myed pa g.yo ba myed pa/ mun pa myed pa snang ba myed pa/ rtog pa myed pa rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ 'du shes
184a7(mdo): myed pa/ yid la byed pa byed pa gcig pa 'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa 'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin/ g.yo ba byed pa/ rlom sems myed pa/ spros pa myed pa/ sogs pa myed pa/ bri ba myed pa/ sgom pa myed pa
184a8(mdo): 'jig pa myed pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmyigs pa thams cad la myi gnas pa'o// gang sems myi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtog pa ni gzugs rnams la myi rgyug ste/ myig dang gzugs rnam
184a9(mdo): par shes pa rig par rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni/ sgra rnams la myi rgyug ste/ rna ba dang sgra rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan
184b1(mdo): byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la myi rgyug ste/ sna dang dri rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni ro rnams la myi rgyug ste/ lce dang ro rnam/
184b2(mdo): par shes pa rig cing rang kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni reg pa rnams la myi rgyug ste/ lus dang reg pa dang rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par
184b3(mdo): bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa mi chos rnam pas kyi rgyag le/ yid dang chos dang rnam pa shem pa ris kyi pa bzhi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtad byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper/
184b4(mdo): na bskal pa sa sreg pa nam mkha' myi tshig cing chus 'jig pa nam mkha' gsher bar myi 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis myi tshig cing
184b5(mdo): bsam gtan dang rnam par tha dad pa dang ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms para'ajug pa thams cad la 'ang / ma chags pa yin no// mnyam par gzhag pa yang yin la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems
184b6(mdo): can rnams kyang zhin tu 'god do// mnyam par gzhag pa na yang dag lab skyed la/ sangs nas kyang 'od khro ba byed pa yin no// 'phagasapa'i skye bo rnams la ni banye bar stor kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i
184b7(mdo): skye bo rnams yongs su sbyir bar bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rab tu 'brar bar byed do// mnyam par gzhag cing mnyam pa yang yin la/ myi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa yang rab tu ston to// mnya
184b8(mdo): pa nyid kyis kyi mnyam pa yang myi mthong / myi mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang kyi byed do// de ni gyi 'gas zhing 'gas pa myed pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// shes
184b9(mdo): rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu kyi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// gangadagis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan nam mkha' dang
185a1(mdo): mtshungs pa ste/ myi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan rnams kyi dbang po yongs su dag/ dran pa rtse
185a2(mdo): gcig yid ni mnyam par gzhag/ gnas rnams thams cad la yang myi gnas shing // 'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid bsgoms par gzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa'i phung po skye mched khams la myi gnas shing //
185a3(mdo): nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te/ mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid// shin tu dben pa'i sems kyang ston
185a4(mdo): byed cing // bzhes pa bsam gtan kun la 'ang myi chags so// 'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su sbyin bya'i phyir// 'chi 'pho skye ba 'chi ba nye stond kyang // ting nge 'dzin las de dag myi nyams ste// de ni sems
185a5(mdo): rtog dbang gis de 'dra'o// gzugs myed ting nge 'dzind kyang spyo// da yul la// sems can rnams ni yongs su sbyin bya'i phyir// 'do// da pa'i khams su 'ang rab tu snang byed de// de dag bdag dang sems
185a6(mdo): can myi gnas so// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te/ sbrum dang yang mtshungs shing smyig rgyu 'dra// rmyi lam cu zla sprin gi mtshan nyid du// chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ 'gro ba
185a7(mdo): kun gyi sems kyi snong sus nu// 'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'brug cing // sems rgyud sa ni bsgrib pa byeskyed pa ste// rang gi sems kyi chun kyang rab tu zhes// bas pa gtan du 'phrul mngon zhes mkhas pa yis/
185a8(mdo): zhing rnams mang po bye bar de 'gro zhing // kyi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi// rgyal ba bsam gyi khyab la mchod par byed// dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i yid/ zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing kyi rtog pa//
185a9(mdo): de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid// rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yod myed la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ma ngan myed de/ mtshan nyid de la gang bdag rab gnas pa/
185b1(mdo): de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes//
185b2(mdo): rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'dug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam pa
185b3(mdo): dag par 'dug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas/ bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / don rnam par dag pas yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/
185b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang 'ashes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/
185b5(mdo): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag pa ra sgrub kyang rtag par lta ba myi sbyor ba dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams// cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar myi ltung ba dang
185b6(mdo): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang myi skye ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar myi byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig par shes par snang yang nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la myi chags pa dang / chos
185b7(mdo): kyi sdom bzhi yang ston la/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang bdag myed pa dang / zhi ba nyid dngos po yang dag par rjes su yang dag par myi mthong ba dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu stond kyang las myed cing
185b8(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa las kyang myi g.yo ba dang / smos pa myed pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin kyang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye bar nges par bstan pa rab tu stond pa dang / chos thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu rnyen pa yin kyi
185b9(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni rnam
186a1(mdo): par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba myed pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni myi 'gyur ba'i tshig go// gnas myed pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par myi rtog pa'i tshig go/
186a2(mdo): yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gi tshig go// 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go// ma rung bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go// bcings pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni
186a3(mdo): yid rno ba'i tshig go// 'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni nges pa'i tshig go// shi nad tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go// brjod du myed pa'i phyir 'di ni don gi tshig so// khyad par myed pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs
186a4(mdo): pa'i tshig go// myi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni snying po'i tshig go// myi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go// byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol ba'i tshig go// rang
186a5(mdo): bzhin gis kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par dag/ pa'i tshig go// snang ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'di ni mun pa myed pa'i/ tshig go// sgro btags pa myed pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i
186a6(mdo): tshig go// shi nad tu zad cing byang ba'i phyir 'di ni zad pa'i tshig go// 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni myi zad pI tshig go// sbyar ba myed pa'i phyir 'di na 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go// shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i
186a7(mdo): phyir 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go// sgribs pa myed pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkha' tshig go// gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go// ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir 'di ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshig go// nam
186a8(mdo): par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su myed pa'i phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go// gnyen po myed pa'i phyir 'di ni myi rdzi ba'i tshig go// mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni lus myed pa'i tshig go// kun tu rtogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi/
186a9(mdo): phyir 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go// sred pa'i bka la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa'i tshig go// rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir 'di ni 'gog pa'i tshig go// gnyis su myed pa'i lam du
186b1(mdo): 'dug pa'i phyir 'di ni bsgom pa'i tshig go// rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i tshig pa
186b2(mdo): 'dug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gi dring la myi 'jog pa 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o// gang nges par bstan pa thams cad la nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chu rul yang myi rtog
186b3(mdo): rnam par myi rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// shes rab lta dang mun pa nyon mongs
186b4(mdo): gcog/ rtag tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing // rgyud rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston// mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su gcod par byed// bdag dang sems can la yang myi gnas shing /
186b5(mdo): gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa myed/ dngos dang dngos myed gnyis las thar byed de// shes rab pa rosod 'gro bar rab tu bstand/ shes rab chu bo las bsngal rab tu smos/ shes rab ye shes byed cing
186b6(mdo): rnam par spyod/ shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston/ des rab kyis ni bsgribs pa'i rtsa ba spyod// phung po khams ni yongs su shes pa 'i mtshan/ mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mtshungs pa mtshan grol byed/ shes rab
186b7(mdo): thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes// yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste// 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni myi gos spyod// spyod pa spyad pa rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes rab dag pa'i myi ni rnam par mdzes// myig snga dag ni yongs
186b8(mdo): dag byed cing // dbang po lnga ni rab tu snang bar byed// 'gro ba rnams ni rab tu gcod par byed// phung po lnga ni zad kyir chos ston to// pha rol tshu rol rtag tu myi gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas/ bar
186b9(mdo): sA ba dang mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste/ sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su mthur zhing 'phags// rnyed dang sa rnyed gnyi ga'i mtha' las gros// dbus la rtog pa kun rtog kyi rtog pa// gang nas 'phags pa thams cad song bam
187a1(mdo): 'chi ba myed pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston/ sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs// lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa 'ang rab tu 'chad// bden pa shes par shes rab 'di 'dug ste// des ni
187a2(mdo): sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad// zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing zhing ma yin// chos rnams thams cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben// sems can thams cad bdag myed sems can mtshungs// shes rab blo spyod pas
187a3(mdo): ni 'di shes so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems kyi sa bon de
187a4(mdo): yang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems dang myi 'bral te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsegs shing bstsag
187a5(mdo): pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed cing / de da/ ga thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshad myed par rab tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir bdag
187a6(mdo): gis bsod nams tshad myed pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems ba skyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed par brtsams pas tshad myed pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpas bsod nams
187a7(mdo): kyi tshogs chad myed pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad myed pa bcu po 'di dag mi gang byang chub sems dpa'as bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dbyel
187a8(mdo): byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas sus kyi rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas ngag gi rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par
187a9(mdo): bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pas/ sems kyi rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyod pa dang ye shes dang / spyod lam tshad myed pas/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba tshad
187b1(mdo): myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa tshad myed pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang / spyod pa tshad myed
187b2(mdo): pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang / spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gtan pa myed pa'i/
187b3(mdo): mchod sbyin mongs su rdzogs pas mdzod spu yongs su sbyang ba chang myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma sa rim 'gro byed cing 'dud pa chang myed pa dang / brgyal bcom pa tshad myed pas dbu'i tsug tor sI gtsug bstar myi mthog
187b4(mdo): ba tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spu dang g.yo myed par 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / mthun par 'dzind pas/ don yod par rnam pa ra gnon pa tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu
187b5(mdo): tshad myed pa bcu po de dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpa' ba/ sod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan sa/ nga rigs kyi bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs
187b6(mdo): par gyur da pa de mkha' tshad myed pas/ de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyi nga tshad myed par kun tu gnas te de bas na bsod nams nam mazhal dang ma tshungs shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
187b7(mdo): ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na// gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang / 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i
187b8(mdo): sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang
187b9(mdo): bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa 'i lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs dang bcas pa'i sems su sang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// des pang /
188a1(mdo): 'dod chags myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid zhe sdang myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las/
188a2(mdo): g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag la zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'tshad do// de bdag nyid gti mug myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan
188a3(mdo): dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid nye bar nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos pa'i sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan rnams la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i
188a4(mdo): phyir chos 'chad do// des 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti muka dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman
188a5(mdo): bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems la mchog tu yang nga/ ga par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
188a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' de gnyis su myed pa'i mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbying sa yongs su shes te chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de/ 'dod chags kyi dbyi ngas chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang kyi dbyings/ chos kyi
188a7(mdo): dbyings gang yin pa de gti mug gi dbyings chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su snga dag pa 'du'o zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni gang yang 'gro ba 'ang myed
188a8(mdo): myi 'gro ba yang myed do// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag myi gnyis so// de
188a9(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o// gang rab tu snang ba de bla gab myed pa'o//
188b1(mdo): bla ga ba myed pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs myed de/ gang mtshan ma myed pa de la gnas pa gang yang myed de/ myi gnas pa ni nam mkha'o// gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / ye shes des chos thams cad
188b2(mdo): kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims las
188b3(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa myed pa'i tshul khrims las kyang myi nyams pa'o// ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las myi 'gyur ba'o// shes rab las sangs
188b4(mdo): rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos thams cad rgyu ba myed par yang rnam par myi to/ ga pa'o// rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dram zhing mes gnyis la yang myi gnas so// rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba las
188b5(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / shes pa thams cad la yang myi chags pa'o// stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su ngan zhing dus gsum mchu/ nges pa'i ye shes las kyang myi g.yo ba'o// myi 'jigs pa las
188b6(mdo): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu yang myi gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgya sa rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam
188b7(mdo): par myi rtog go// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang / gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag par myi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas drang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang
188b8(mdo): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su myi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su yang 'gro ba'o// phung po dang khams dang
188b9(mdo): skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang bdag par rjes su kyi mthong la phung po dang khams dang skye ma ched kyi ngo bo nyid zhes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su sang 'gro 'a'o// gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
189a1(mdo): shes pas shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad myed de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba myed de/ gang de lta bu rnyog pa myed pa'i dran pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa ni sangs rgyas
189a2(mdo): kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par myi byed de/ 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang /
189a3(mdo): 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang smra ba dang / myi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par myi byed do// de la mngon par myi chags pas/ dran pa 'ang dran par myi byed/ myi dran pa 'ang dran par myi byed do// de dran pa yid la myi
189a4(mdo): byed pas/ gzugs dang mtshan dang chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas te/ sa su myi dran no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/ gang la mtshan ma dang
189a5(mdo): dmyigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa myed pa'o// rigs// kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis ga/ nang pa'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos shes bya ba ni
189a6(mdo): 'dod chags myed pa'o// de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung / de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// chos shes bya ba ni kun / ni myed pa'o// de la gang chos sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran
189a7(mdo): ba ga pa sa myed do// chos shes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang byed do// chos shes bya ba ni mtshan ma myed pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i/
189a8(mdo): rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// chos shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus byas su rab tu gzhag la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang myed do// gang chos rjes su dran pa ni/
189a9(mdo): gag gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba myed par mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon myed pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'as chos thams cad rang bzhin gis ma skyes par rig nas/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu
189b1(mdo): 'thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so// gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa de ni chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
189b2(mdo): dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o// de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'gro ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa myed do// chos gang yang
189b3(mdo): kun tu spyod pa myed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu des byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa mngon par 'dra
189b4(mdo): byed pas rjes su dran par myi nus so// gzhan lus kyi las dang / ga gi las dang / yid kyi lus kun tu spyod pa myed pa ni mngon par 'du myi byed pa zhes bya'o// de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad
189b5(mdo): do// 'dus ma byas pa ni gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa'o// tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o//
189b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i ga tong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong ba zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des chos gang yang

189b9(mdo): xxx
190a1(mdo): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu 'ang bsngos te rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rjes su dran pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen/
190a2(mdo): pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su myed pa de la yid la byed ci yang myed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i
190a3(mdo): gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims shes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa myed pa smon lam myed pa/ lhun
190a4(mdo): kyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad so ngas su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind kyi gnas te sems kyi dmyigs pa'i gnas pa ma yin no// shes
190a5(mdo): rab kyi rtsa ba ste spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// rnam par grol ba// 'i rgyu mthun pa ste gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// mkhas pas// rab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no// nyon mongs
190a6(mdo): pa zhi ba ste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa myed pa de ni/ rigs/
190a7(mdo): kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lA'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhen
190a8(mdo): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi smarnams rjes su dran no// sang skye ba gcig gis
190a9(mdo): thegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dram pa ste/ bcu ga pa zhes/ pha rol du phyind pa thams cad kyin pas zhes rab kyi pha ros tu byin dpa spyi bor gyu rad pa dang /
190b1(mdo): mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na myi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang skur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzind myi nyams pa dang
190b2(mdo): se so yang dag par rig pa'i nang nadon dang / spobs pa rgyun gyi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi napan chags pa myed po'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
190b3(mdo): stobs dang myi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag thil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying
190b4(mdo): po la 'dug nas/ sems skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis ma don par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo'i chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bag la nya
190b5(mdo): dang / kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khru/ gas/ spros pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa mye dpas/ lnga rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis
190b6(mdo): gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu des ji ltar na bya bachub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / nga chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das
190b7(mdo): pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmyigs pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched nas kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba myed pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las
190b8(mdo): 'das pa dang / mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byid kyis yi shin tu byin gyis brlabs/ shes rab dang ye shes ni
190b9(mdo): shin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa ni gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'azhor ba rab tu bskyed pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu
191a1(mdo): spangs shing ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas/ myi skye ba las skye zhing myi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang
191a2(mdo): sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba yang myi 'chad do// de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su tshang ba zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes kyi sgo gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las
191a3(mdo): 'das pa dang / mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa yin zhe na/ rigs
191a4(mdo): kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 2di ni sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go// gang yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ brjod du myed pa de/ sangs
191a5(mdo): rgyas kyi ye shes kyi maphyend te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye she/ sa kyis myi rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis myi rig pa// de la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs dang /
191a6(mdo): rang gi shes pas/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid rje sa su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i gang ngo bo nyid gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed
191a7(mdo): rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ myi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal pa
191a8(mdo): mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ spro'i mtshan nyid dam/ myi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan
191a9(mdo): thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam
191b1(mdo): nye ba'i chu'i mtshan nyid kyang chung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyis ngan nyid yang dag pa ji sa pa bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad ma zhan ma tho ba myed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de skar na/ byang chub sems dpa/
191b2(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog zhes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzid yin zhe na/
191b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni myi zad pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid las rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
191b4(mdo): dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzud pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do// ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa myi zad cing mtha' myed pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang myi
191b5(mdo): zad cing mtha' myed pa'o// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba/ ni gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshes/
191b6(mdo): pas bshad pa dang / 'dzad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba de dgams cad ni de bzhin no// ma nor ba de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa'o// ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag
191b7(mdo): zhugs pas de'i phyir/ de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na ma nor pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na// don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
191b8(mdo): ces bya zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du myi 'tshal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
191b9(mdo): khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa/ kun dga'o lta bur gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du yang ye ge khong du chud par myi nus so// yang dor gcig tu bstan te ji lta ba bzhin
192a1(mdo): tu bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams cad myi brjed cing don thams cad myi nyams par sems can
192a2(mdo): thams cad la mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar bcad/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba byed cing / de dag la chos dkon mchog
192a3(mdo): rab tu sgrog pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no// yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas
192a4(mdo): pa de'i ngo bo nyid du byang chub sems dpa'as chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sang sa rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /
192a5(mdo): yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmyi lam ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba myed pa'i tshul gyis/ smyig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / myi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis/ myig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin myed pa'i tshul gyis
192a6(mdo): gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par myi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa myed pa'i tshul gyis smon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
192a7(mdo): dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang / bral ba'i tshul kyis 'dod chags myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul kyis/ 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid du de sbyang / rigs kyi bu tha stad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa
192a8(mdo): la nyen nas de 'dra bar ngas chos de mngon pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i pho bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par myi nus so// de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'as de lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis/
192a9(mdo): chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ yi ge dang nges pa'i nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la bstan bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu des ji skaran/ byang chub sems dpa' rnon/
192b1(mdo): mnas/ sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed cen/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po myed de/ byang chub sems/
192b2(mdo): dpas chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas/ sems can gang rnams yongs su smyin par byed pa/ de la de bdag tu lta bar myi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ srog tu lta bar ma yin/ gang zag tu
192b3(mdo): lta bar yang myi 'gyur ro// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ phyin ci log ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas bkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa 'dus pa dang / yang dag pa
192b4(mdo): ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod do// snyas so// des byang chub sems dpas myed pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs par ba tu spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ dngos
192b5(mdo): gang yang chud myi gson to// sems can myed cing sems ca/ na dben pas sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed de// re/ star byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas
192b6(mdo): sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi des ji skam sa byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin sa rab tu sbyor bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub cen nus
192b7(mdo): zhin nyes bya ba rten ci 'dres par 'grang ba tu 'jug ro// 'bas phyi 'i na/ rtswa da rkyen ci dru ba de 'an par 'bras bu ma par duzu'o// sbyin pa ni sang sa spyod pan po'i rkyed/ des kyang chub cems
