193a1(mdo): pa dang / nges pa ni lus dang / ngag dang snyems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang / ngag dang sems brgyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan
193a2(mdo): par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de yang thams can mkhyend par bsngos nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang
193a3(mdo): chub sems dpas brtson 'grus brtsams nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i brtson 'grus de yang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas// brtson
193a4(mdo): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang / cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dka' ba dang / cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs
193a5(mdo): kun tu skong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de yang thams cad mkhyend pa/ ra bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su/ rdzogs par byed do// thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/
193a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmyigs par lta bar myi'aji nad cing / dmyigs pa myed pa'i thos pa de yang thams cad mabye na par bsngos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs
193a7(mdo): su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de/ dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang brtsegs pa de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa
193a8(mdo): zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag myed pa de bzhi sems can thams cad la bdag myed do// ji ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams
193a9(mdo): cad stong ngo // ji ltar bdag mying du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mying du btags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul bzhin yid la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par
193b1(mdo): sbyor ro// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu
193b2(mdo): de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/ de la rigs kyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa
193b3(mdo): bskyed pa de dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba yi lta bar gyur da pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas/ lta ba dang len pa thams//
193b4(mdo): cad myed par mngon par shes pa skyed de/ ye shes dang ldan na/ shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs shing / lus dben/ ses
193b5(mdo): dben te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar zhi zhing / phyi rol// da tu myi rgyu ba/ yul myed pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang // ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shi nang tu brtag pas
193b6(mdo): brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo/ nyon mongs pas ma 'azhugs pa snang ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib myed pa/ bsod nams rkye tshogs bstsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bstsags pa/ zhi
193b7(mdo): gnas kyi tshogs bstsags pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs bstsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya lad bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes
193b8(mdo): rab shin tu snyoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su mthun pa/ snying rjes rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa/ de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa bskyed de/ byang chub kyi snying po
193b9(mdo): bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong / sgra thams cad thos/ sems can thams cad la 'jug
194a1(mdo): cing bskald pa grangs myed pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams
194a2(mdo): cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin du spun gyis grub par gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las myi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no//
194a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel
194a4(mdo): par 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyis mying dang gzugs
194a5(mdo): mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen kyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen kyi// sa sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa/ lend pa'i rkyen kyis
194a6(mdo): srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen kyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen kyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar
194a7(mdo): sdug bsngal kyi phu bo chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gag/ rkyen kag yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel ma
194a8(mdo): kun ni 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o// de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gag pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gag pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes
194a9(mdo): pa 'gag pas mying dang gzugs 'gag/ mying dang gzugs 'gag pas/ skye mched drug 'gan skye mched drug 'gag pas/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gag pas/ tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba
194b1(mdo): 'gag pas/ sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gag pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pas/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pas/ skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag pas/ rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags
194b2(mdo): 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' shig 'gag par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul
194b3(mdo): zhes bya'o// sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gag rkyen gag yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
194b4(mdo): thams cad kyis ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa'i ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
194b5(mdo): yul lo// rang gi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams sbyor ba shes so// gzhan sa/ pa zab mo zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang /
194b6(mdo): chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigatshogs ni kun nas btsal kyang myi dmyigs so// gang myi dmyigs pa de ni zab mo'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so//
194b7(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rnam par dag go// de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma skyes ma bskyed
194b8(mdo): ma 'gags/ ma 'gags pa ste/ de bas narnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mun pa myed pa/ snang ba myed pa/ kun gzhi byed pa/ rab rib myed pa/ don dam pa/ zab mo gang la myig myed cing dmyig 'gog pa myed pa
194b9(mdo): nas/ med kyi bar cu byed cing yid 'gog pa myed pa ste/ den yul tu 'brang ba sa yin no// gang sus tum yin ming chus byed pa mdo dam pa ste/ de'i phyir ba' mo zhes bya'o// de sa sems dang mid 'dzin pa byed de/

195a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
195a4(mdo): sems te/ gang rten pa de ni dngos po myed pa/ gang brten pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa/ gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni myi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba/ bdag myed pa zhi ba/ gang brten pa de la ni bdag
195a5(mdo): byed/ sems can myed/ srog myed/ gso ba myed/ skyes bu// myed/ gang zag myed/ shed las skyes pa myed/ shed du mye// da gang brten pa de la ni yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang myed/
195a6(mdo): gang brten pa de ni ci yang myed pa/ rtsol ba myed/ stong pa/ mtsha na ma myed pa dben pa rgyu ba myed pa/ ma smos pa/ spros pa myed pa ste/ de phyir skye ba na chos kho na skye/ 'gag pa na chos 'o
195a7(mdo): na 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gas/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gas/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu myed ces bya'o// chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'jug
195a8(mdo): ba de dag la ni skye ba ci yang byed cing bdag po myed de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rtsa rang shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / myig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba na skyed par byed pa
195a9(mdo): byed/ 'gag pa na yang 'gag par byed pa myed pa/ de bzhin du nang gi chos rnams skye ba na yang skyed par byed pa myed/ 'gag pa na yang 'gag par byed pa myed de/ gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi rkyen ma
195b1(mdo): tshang na 'gag go snyam du sems te/ de ltar na shes pa la sbyor ba'i mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo // de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/ kang de myi skyed cing rnam par myi 'jig
195b2(mdo): pa ni chad pa dang rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa ste/ mthar
195b3(mdo): lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer myed pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
195b4(mdo): rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin nyid dbyer myed pa de ni phyag rgya ste/ phye ba myed pa/ 'jug pa myed pa/ mngon par zhen pa myed pa/ myi spyod pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin
195b5(mdo): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phyag rgyades btab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ni sa
195b6(mdo): tu kyi skye ba'i phyag rgya shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shim nam myed pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu smon pa myed pa'i phyag bya/ rje tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod dachags dang bral
195b7(mdo): phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/ shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rgyu gyi sdang ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegasa' ba'i phyag rgya de yang spyan lnga la
195b8(mdo): myi sdang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyis ste nyid du 'o// ya de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab bzhin du tha snyad 'dogs so// de la gang dka rnam par
195b9(mdo): shes pa'i spyod yul de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do// gang ngas rnam par shes pa la gyi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par gyi byed/ chos tha dad du myi byed do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
196a1(mdo): phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par myi byed do// de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang 'bring dang rab kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dag chos
196a2(mdo): thams cad la myi rtog cing rnam par myi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dad du myi byed do// yang ji snyed mang por brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar myi nus te/ dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha'
196a3(mdo): la rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams ni 'dres par gyi byed do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par myi byed do// gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems
196a4(mdo): dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par gyi byed do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing chos kyi
196a5(mdo): dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos rgya dbyings shes bya ba la ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so// yang dag par bsgrubs pa myed pa'i phyir
196a6(mdo): ma skyes pa'i dbyings so// ma byung ba'i phyir myi 'gog pa'i dbyings so// 'gro ba myed pa'i phyir myi 'gro ba'i dbyings so// rgal ba myed pa'i phyi ra 'ong ba myed pa'i dbyings so// 'byung ba myed pa'i phyir gnas myed
196a7(mdo): pa'i dbyings so// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so// bzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings so// don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag myed pa'i dbyings so// gnas myed pa'i phyir
196a8(mdo): rnam par rig pa myed pa'i dbyings so// 'dre ba myed pa'i phyir kun gzhi myed pa'i dbyings so// nges par gyu dad pa'i phyir skye ba myed pa'i dbyings so// rang bzhin gis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so// gnyen
196a9(mdo): po byed pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas/ de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi nul
196b1(mdo): la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / brjod pa dang ston pa de thams cad ni chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi
196b2(mdo): dbyings de dag gnyis su myed par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// zhe sdang gi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe

197a1(mdo): pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// phung po'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// sa'i khams dang / chu'i

197a7(mdo): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi byed pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po myi byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po myi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa myi phyed pa
197a8(mdo): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa myi byed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su myi skyo bar myi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa myi byed pa dang / mtshan dang dbye byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin byed
197a9(mdo): pa myi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba myi byed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba myi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa myi phyed

197b2(mdo): bdag nyid ni myi 'byigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bosam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi byed pa yang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang bdag nyid
197b3(mdo): ni theg pa chen po 'di las myi byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing myi g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub
197b4(mdo): sems dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing / rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma yin pa yul myed pa/ yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub
197b5(mdo): sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas rang gi yul yod sa su sbyong ste/ de 'di snyam du myig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yi na yang / sangs rgyas kyi yus ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no/
197b6(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni myig gi yul gang yang myed do// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang
197b7(mdo): yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ri dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ri ba'i yul gang yang myed do// sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi
197b8(mdo): yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ri ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yus ni dben pa'i yul srin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul pa ni sna'i sul gang yang byed do// sde'i sprul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang /
197b9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi yus ni su nang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yir ro// debu'i phyi de na/ sangs rgyas kyi sus ri dben pa'i mum yin pa'i phying/ dbe pa'i yus ma ni gro'i sras gang yar byed// sram kyi sus ni sangs rgyas kyi sam yin /
198a1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang myed do//
198a2(mdo): yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul
198a3(mdo): gang yang myed do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa la yang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi/
198a4(mdo): yul dben pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dben par 'jug go// rang gi zhing yongs su dag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos ga/ dang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad
198a5(mdo): la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben par 'jug go// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa myed cing thogs pa myed pa de bzhin du/ de yul thams cad la yang myi chags myi thogs te/ rigs kyi bu
198a6(mdo): de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul la yongs su dag pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji skar / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu myi brjed
198a7(mdo): par spyod pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongs su srung bar bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa gang zhes/ rigs kyi bu sum bcu rtsa gnyis po
198a8(mdo): 'di dag ni/ gzungs yongs su spang ba byed pa ste/ sum bcurtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chom don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa dang / choms gzhol ba dang /
198a9(mdo): chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la rten cing / bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po dmas sa dargyal byed cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su
198b1(mdo): tshol bas myi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstand pa rnams la bka' tho bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul pa myi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa
198b2(mdo): dang / klog pa dang / ston pa sa le so skyed pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe 'byung byed cing ba zing byed par chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar
198b3(mdo): thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir/ mang du thos pa mu myed par byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu myed par byas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang /
198b4(mdo): yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug myi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su myi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'ong khro ba myed pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
198b5(mdo): mya 'gal ba'i las dang / bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la myi skrag pa dang / 'phag pI rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yongs su
198b6(mdo): yi myi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhu ma pa myed pa dang / sems can la lta bas snying rje ba dang / chos la lta bas lus dang / srog 'dor ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag
198b7(mdo): tung rgyal myed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba la yongs su myi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyong ba byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun gzung ba'i chos rnams myi brjed pa dang /
198b8(mdo): ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams myi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge myi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / spobs pa bstan
198b9(mdo): pa thogs pa byed cing / rgyan gyi 'chad pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa zhes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la shes pa dang / kun rdzob kyi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer/
199a1(mdo): myed pa'i de kho na bstan pa zhes pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa nges pa pa zhes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi 'gong ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul/
199a2(mdo): gi rkang pas rnam par rosad pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa myi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang / mthun par shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang /
199a3(mdo): zhi gnas kyi sems gnas pa shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su mthun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i
199a4(mdo): ye shes bskyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang / ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brdal ston pa
199a5(mdo): shes pa dang / don dbyer myed par shes pa dang / tshig 'bru myi zad par she nyes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so// ci rigs par shes pa stond par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
199a6(mdo): cad kyis gsungs pa/ bas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin
199a7(mdo): du rtog pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib myed par snang bar shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs shes bya'o// lus dang ngag dang sems dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa gang yin
199a8(mdo): ba de ni myi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bskyed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin ste/ gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas
199a9(mdo): kyi chos thams cad la myi brjed par spyod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu myi brjed par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs
199b1(mdo): pabyed cing rgyun gyi 'chang la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe
199b2(mdo): na 'di lta ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa myed pa dang / spobs pa rgyan gyi 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig sa soms pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la so'am
199b3(mdo): pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang rtogs pa brjod
199b4(mdo): pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang / myi thus pa'i spobs pa dang / cig rab tu dbel ba bstan pa myi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs bzhin btu gsal zhing shi nad tu mdzes pa dang / cig btsun zhing gzung
199b5(mdo): ba'i spobs pa dang / chos bston pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i/ spobs pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
199b6(mdo): la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor sa byams pa dang / snying rje dang dka' ba dang btang snyoms kyi spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin
199b7(mdo): kyi rlabs kyis byin kyis chubs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi sum pazhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no// de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba nyi shu ma pa nis 'grub ste/ nyi shu ma pa'i
199b8(mdo): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngas myi gcog pas gyur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshur shog cig ces bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba la g.yo myed pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad la
199b9(mdo): chags pa byed pas spobs pa thogs pa myed par 'gyur ro// de sa ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun myi 'chad par 'gyur ro// phra ma'i tshig myed pas shi nang tu nges pa'i tshig sa spobs par 'gyur ro// rten cing
200a1(mdo): 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa sna tshogs bstsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro// chung ma legs par brgyan te rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs/
200a2(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems las kyi nyams pas zhum pa myed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par kun tu srungs pas 'jigs pa myed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gdugs dang rgyal
200a3(mdo): mtshan dang / ba dam dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim mo byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro ba mdong
200a4(mdo): rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung la spobs par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon myed pa la myi brnyas pas/ myi thul pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gter myi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos la
200a5(mdo): sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba myi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro// tshig bden pa dang / tha ba myed pa dang / ngag nub po myed pa'i ngag/ ki las dang / ldan pas spobs pa shin tugasal zhing mdzes pa
200a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// bla ma'i tshig khyad du mi gsod pa dang / gzhan rnaMg myi gcog pas cig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ rang 'i yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas/ chos bstan pa 'bras bu long
200a7(mdo): pa'i slobs par 'gyur ro// bdas la kyi spyod pa dang gzhanas kyi stod pa dang / 'phangs pa'i dngom mo yongs su gtong bas pa'i 'khor kyi rkyen gyi mobs par 'gyur ro// chos su slob dpom tshurang ba 'thung byed pa dang
200a8(mdo): chos ji ltar zos pa bzhin du ston pas/ the cos thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la gyi gnod pa dang rang pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu
200a9(mdo): sbyin pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs myi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag kyi ltung ba myi gleng ba dang / 'khrul pa la myi rtog
200b1(mdo): pas/ 'khrul pa myed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa
200b2(mdo): dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don tu myi gnyer bas 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// bka' blo bde ba dang / nges pa dang ji skad smras/
200b3(mdo): pa bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par myi byed pas skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po las myi nyes pa dang / theg pa dman pa myi 'dod pa dang / sems
200b4(mdo): can la snying rje ba dang / thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas dkyis byin kyis rlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems cad gnam ma go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can
200b5(mdo): gzhan la nan tan du bya ba smon pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gi sems kyi rgyad tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes rgya/ sems can gzhan gi sems dang mthun par stond pas de'i phyir
200b6(mdo): spobs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldanga'i byang chub sems dpa' ni stobs pa thogs pa myed cing rgyun gyi 'arangs te gtu sangs rgyas kyi byir gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no//
200b7(mdo): xxx
200b8(mdo): dang rnam pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang med/ 'di ste/ sdig pa'i grags kyi sangs pa mas nga/ gtu dge pa'i bzhes gnye sa badzin pa dang / bzhin na songs sa dran pa dang / sangs sa
200b9(mdo): gna' ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung ma yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzid dang / snyoms par 'dug pa dang / snang ba zhes pa dang / shes rab dang 'bas thung du 'dres pa dang / mngon pa ma shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa dang
201a1(mdo): ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba so sor rtog pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can la lta ba yi byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la nges par sems dpa' dang /
201a2(mdo): chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho myed par 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmyi lam gi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
201a3(mdo): 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs ras skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang 'byung bar yang myi sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i
201a4(mdo): rabs bstan pa tshad myed po'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad nib gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o//
201a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho// ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no// rigs kyi bu// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las
201a6(mdo): yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de sa byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang
201a7(mdo): dag par 'da'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtog pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da'o//
201a8(mdo): byang chub kyi sems las myi nyams pas lha'i bu bdud las yang dag par 'da'o// yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te// des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la
201a9(mdo): bcud kyis klags kyi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi srung ba bdud kyi las dang / sems tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi sas dang / skye bas gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud rtsi
201b1(mdo): las dang // de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi chos ngan pa la spod pa na bdud kyi
201b2(mdo): las dang 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myi sngo ba bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la smon pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa' sdang ba
201b3(mdo): bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byas pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams yongs su myi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par myi 'dod pa
201b4(mdo): bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gi dpe 'khyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang / zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral bar sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud
201b5(mdo): kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor pa bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong 'khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la myi gus pa bdud kyi las dang /
201b6(mdo): nyan thos kyi slab pa'i rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin pa'i sgrub pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor
201b7(mdo): nas rigs la rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod bdud kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas la spyod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems can gyi ni bya'o cho ga la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal la gnas shing myi 'dud
201b8(mdo): pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / myi drang ba dang / rtsub cing brlang ba dang / sdig pa la myi smod pa dang / chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang / thos pa cung zad tsam gyis chog/
201b9(mdo): sa par 'dzid pa dang / chom ma yin pa dod tu gnyes ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang cod pa dang / kun das ldang ba rnam par gyi gnon pa bdud kyilas dang / sems kyi rnam gyi rtog pa bdud kyis ma
202a1(mdo): dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma la myi mdzes pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du myi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so// chos bzhis na bdud kyi las 'di
202a2(mdo): dag las shin tu 'das te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug po dag dang / dad pa dang / brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la gnas
202a3(mdo): te sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / chos kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par
202a4(mdo): 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad myed pa bsngags shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
202a5(mdo): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas ka/ nas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam/ gtan rnams bde ba la chags par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams
202a6(mdo): la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nas da ka gis longs spyod myi zad pa yin// bsam pa dag pas lag na rA na po che yin/ mthon dman gyi yid myed pas sems sa dang mtshungs
202a7(mdo): pa yin// tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ bsam pa 'byor pa yin/ mchod sbyin thams cad bsgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa myed pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang / spobs pa phun sum
202a8(mdo): tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myed par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no// ji ltar phyi rol kyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du
202a9(mdo): bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur da cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma
202b1(mdo): gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad myed pa bstsags shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la
202b2(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yon zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga chub sems dpa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes
202b3(mdo): pas stobs bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba char phyin pa yin/ dus gsum sa chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas/ sangs
202b4(mdo): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis snang bathob pas sun snga yongs su srung bar bya ba tsar phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro
202b5(mdo): ba thob pas mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba// tshar phyind pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag parabacad pas dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bkang ba tshar phyin
202b6(mdo): pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas/ sa dang ngag dang sems dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad babang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin dbang
202b7(mdo): bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba char byin pa yin/ pashes kyi tshogs bstsags pas/ sangs rgyas kyis thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba mar phyin pa sngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
202b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams sa rgyang yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing /
202b9(mdo): sems can thams cad kyisems dang spyod pa ma phyochags pa sor len/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ste/ dper na 'das tha ming rnasems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba'i sred pa de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i rgyag rgyamam tshor
203a1(mdo): po la yod de/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems snang ba 'am/ gzugs snang ba 'am/ smar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
203a2(mdo): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po na ro gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
203a3(mdo): sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las kyi yol ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sa
203a4(mdo): rtog pas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las myi yol lo// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang ldan gcig myi gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa
203a5(mdo): thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thams cad dang lhan gcig myi gnas so// 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po na chu thams cad zed pas bri ba 'am gang ba myed do// de bzhin
203a6(mdo): du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba 'am gang myed do// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshon cha da myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad
203a7(mdo): byed do// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no//
203a8(mdo): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po mi sems can tshad myed pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongasu sbyin par bya ba tshad byed pa'i gnas yin no// 'di ni rgyam ma chen po'i phyag rgyan
203a9(mdo): ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la myi chags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags
203b1(mdo): pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhen/ rags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnamam sa lta ba kun nas snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni lta ba kuran nas sdang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang
203b2(mdo): dag par 'das pa yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni nam mkha'i dkyil la myi chags pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa yang sems can thams cad la myi chags so// yang
203b3(mdo): skyes bu das pa de dag ni spyad pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni dran pa'o// spyad pa ni rnam par myi g.yeng ba yin no// de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa yang yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gad chos
203b4(mdo): rnams la myi shes pa'o// snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa myed/ de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing sdang ba thob pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi dri la myi 'jog cing
203b5(mdo): rang gi sa ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye she/ sa 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
203b6(mdo): chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ myur du thA/ mas cad mkhyer pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
203b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyis de'i che/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig lta ba kun nas sems dben zhing // mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la// mtshan ma ldang ba yongs su spangs nas su/
203b8(mdo): byang chub phyir bsngo de ni zad myi 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang rgyal kun spangs nas// de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed/ mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs
203b9(mdo): par byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te/ nang na sems dang yid ni myi rgyu ba// de ni 'thun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran// chos ni 'dod chags bral
204a1(mdo): zhing rang bzhin dben// zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma byed// gang zhig dmyigs pa'i thams cad bral gyur da pa// de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa yin// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/ stong /
204a2(mdo): pa mtshan myed smon lam rnam par grol// de la sems myed dran dang 'jug pa myed// de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin// phung po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong // nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs
204a3(mdo): par 'dor// snyoms pa myed cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag/ 'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran// tshul khrims zag pa myed cing 'dus ma byas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa myed/ 'byung ba myed
204a4(mdo): cing srid gsum myi gnas pa// de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yi na// lha gang dag cing dri myed nyon mongs myed// dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur da pa// sems can dag pa de dag 'dir
204a5(mdo): dran zhing // bdag kyang myur tu de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin po ni// nyon mongs dang // sa po thams cad 'dzin myi byed// chos dang chos myin gnyis
204a6(mdo): las rnam par grol// de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin// rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang brnyes pa// chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzind cing // gang gis rdul myed mtha' ni rab shes
204a7(mdo): pa/ de ni sangs rgyas kun kyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag/ chos kun dag pas mkhas pa sus rtogs pa// de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can
204a8(mdo): gdon phyir rtag tu yongs sbyin byed// sems can las nas ma rung myi byed cing // de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba myed// lta ba nor ba rab tu spang bar ston// de 'dra de ni sems can mang po skyong // 'jig rten yul kun
204a9(mdo): rab tu gang ston pa// des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas yul ni nam mtha' mtshungs pa ste// de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni//
204b1(mdo): brag cha 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing // de la nyan pa 'ang shin tu yod myin par// de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs thob bo// kun tu 'dzin dong 'dzin cing klog pa dang // chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam par rab bshad/
204b2(mdo): kyang // bdag dang sems can chos su rlom sems myed// de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing // legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa// dran dang /
204b3(mdo): ting nge 'dzin dang bral myi 'gyur// gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go// chos ni rnam pa kun tu bstsags myed pas// chos la myi 'phro 'phros pa myed pa 'ang yin// dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar
204b4(mdo): de ltar de yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs myed rgyun chags rgyun chad myi 'gyur bar// mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chad// sems can dbang por ses
204b5(mdo): can 'du shes myed// sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong // du// rgyun myi 'chad par chos ni rab ston cing // bsam pa ci ba// zhin sems can tshim par byed// spobs pa'i tshul gyis sangs
204b6(mdo): rgyas yon tan gnas/ chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba zhe sa// gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la/ sems na na srog dang gang zag myi 'dzin pa// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam
204b7(mdo): chos 'dzin// sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba myed/ su'i bzod 'dri dri myed 'od gsal ba// de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin// phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur
204b8(mdo): mthong // chos dbyings ji 'dra de bzhin mazhes rnams shes// dang po drug ni grong stong 'drar mthong ba// de ni phung po bdud las yang dag 'da'/ sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams// bag yod tshul
204b9(mdo): bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing / chos la myi rtog rnam par myi rtog pa// de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye myed myas// 'od la gang yang 'pho myed 'gro ba myed// chos
205a1(mdo): rnam mangs byed so ba byed shes pa// 'od 'a mdas bdud rtsi dbang kyi 'gro// gang nigag mo dang rlom sems tu byad cing // byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes byed/ bangs dpa sems can byed kya /
205a2(mdo): rje 'dug/ de ring bung da mas pa'i bdud btus so// rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthod// 'dus byas kyi gnas 'dus ma byas la phyid/ 'gro ba'i sems ni snum 'dra mthong ba// de'i sems dpa'i
205a3(mdo): bskyed pa yid/ pha ros tu ros gangs 'ang gyi grasas/ com ldan mu nisang dag su myong zhing / sems can rlom sang sems cad 'du shes byed/ mnyam pa zhes bya byang chu'i sems dpa' re/ zir ba gsum la
205a4(mdo): 'phrog dkon 'dra ba dang / stong pa 'gyur ba myed par rabashes shis/ dralas gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems cad rlol// de ni dad dpon bdud kyi mas stond pa// 'dzangs pa de'i tshul dang tshul gyin mkhas// chos
205a5(mdo): rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang rig pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya// se/ mas kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur// sems ni sems la
205a6(mdo): gnas kyang mtshams myi sbyor// 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya// nam mkho'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla 'dra// chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag
205a7(mdo): ces// nyon mongs kun dang 'dres par myi byed pa// sems can dag pa de ni ma spang ba/ gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun// sgyum smyig rgyu 'dra bar gzung myed dang // gsog dang brdzun dang rtag pa myed
205a8(mdo): par shes// de ni byang chub snying por myur du 'gro/ chos gtams 'bebs pa snyan pa 'di bshad pa ra/ hA dang kyi dang l+h+wa ma yin dang kyi 'am ci dang / kau 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag zhig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis
205a9(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sa
205b1(mdo): nam pa drug rab tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// lha brgyad stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs zhim si la snyad dag kyang dkros nas/ 'di ga gang dag bstan pa 'ang thos
205b2(mdo): nas mos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su dong ba yin no// gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis/
205b3(mdo): rgyan gyis legs par brgyun pa byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyur da na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag
205b4(mdo): kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa srung bstan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ma ngon tu rangs pa
205b5(mdo): mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma myed cing rnam par dag pa stong / gsum yongs su gang ba rib/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skul mdo na bar gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'ang skad ces gas/
205b6(mdo): ras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes mi chags pa myi mnga' zhing sgrib pa myi mnga' ba/ bstan pa ni rgyun gyi 'chad pa/ de
205b7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog ma yin pa mkhyend pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor
205b8(mdo): thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'di yang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la yang chos kyi snang ba
205b9(mdo): chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i sgo/ bstan pa'as 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pastan par bgyi'o//
206a1(mdo): bam po bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'azhor de nyid du 'dus par gyur da te 'dug pa des/ byang chub
206a2(mdo): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi mying nam mtha' mdzod ces bya ba de ni nam mkha' mdzod dam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do//
206a3(mdo): myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nam mtha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
206a4(mdo): khyod kyis nam mtha' mdzod kyi khyab par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mdzod kyis// byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la
206a5(mdo): gag 'dod pa de kho bos nam mazha' la char 'bab bo// de nas bya/ nga chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de/ bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ud pa la'i dpal gi 'jig rten gi
206a6(mdo): zhams pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams cad rnam par sA ra ba zhes bya ba'i pad ma rgyar ni rgyang grags kyi tshad 'dab ma bye ba stong phra ga mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na
206a7(mdo): bde ba/ dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa// khe dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing cho ga myi shes pa pad ma de mthong ba dang / dri bsdams pas/ byang chub sems dpal de dag ting nge 'dzin
206a8(mdo): thob par 'gyur ba de bdag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad ma'i mar po bshig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag du/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkhal mdzod
206a9(mdo): kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis/ nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ de na 'khor de dag thams cad pad ma de dag gi dri tshor zhing mthong bas dga' ba'i zas shes bya'i ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
206b1(mdo): zhugs so// 'khor de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin sas sangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byid kyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs ses/
206b2(mdo): so legs so// sems cad thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur da cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod ces bya bar 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpal rnam mkha'
206b3(mdo): mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam ma'al las gser phye'i char phobashig/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis tshig de skad ces spras ma thag tu de'i mo la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char
206b4(mdo): mngon par phab bo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen pa kod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams
206b5(mdo): cad kyi char phob shig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod la phyogs bcur rin po che grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i mying tha dad pa dang 'don/ dad pa yod pa de dag gi cher chen po mngon par phab bo// 'di lta ste/
206b6(mdo): gser dang dngul dang / shel dang bye dUr+ya dang / rdol snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i za ba can dang / myed dang / rin chen byi ru dang / zla ba'i 'od dang mye shel dang / sngang
206b7(mdo): byed dang / 'ad mchog dang / 'angs sring 'od dang kye 'od dang / dung dang ma shes dang / byin dang / a nang rnyil dang / yon ta 'byung gnas dang / rab kun pa'i 'od dang / rtsa 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang
206b8(mdo): byed dang / ma'i 'od dang / kyi byed pa'i gnas dang / rkyeg kyi bzod pa dang / byin thogs pa dang / rtul pa dang / ra rgyal ba dang / ka'i 'dzid 'brar ba dang / dpas kyi snying po'i rgyas po dang /
206b9(mdo): ro rje'i me bcan dang / 'jig rted snang ba dang / skams dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang zlogs dang / 'angs bu'i chu bo dang / 'jas su'i grong ni 'od dang / mad gong sngan dang / nar ma'i gro dang / rtso ma'od dang /

207a2(mdo): dang / ngon pa da/ di skye po dang / dgang po dang 'dog dang / na nas semasas cad ya ngas par 'grus pa dang / gying nges bu dang / byi sa ma che ba
207a3(mdo): shA 'aM/ nom bu chen po che de dag gi mying bskal par yang bad pa ma rnam yid do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyas po zhes bya ba des/ bya cu sems dpa' namama'a' mdzongs 'di skad ces smras so// rims kyi
207a4(mdo): bu phyi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbus pa/ zas dang rlom byed pa gcer bu gos myed pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams bkres shing sgom pas yongs su zin pa
207a5(mdo): gcer bu rang gi sgras g.yog pa/ mchil ma dang / ngar sA ba sa dang / khrag dang nag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de bskyab pa/ 'i phyir/ zas dang skom dang gos kyi char khyod kyis phob shig/
207a6(mdo): de na de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / myang ba dang ldag pa dang sna tshogs char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang
207a7(mdo): btung ba thams cad kyi char kyi rgyan shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo// kos kha dog tu ma dang khwa dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / phra zhing 'jam pa ka tsa yin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i char rab tu
207a8(mdo): pa ba ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / mi dgas thams cad kun tshim par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
207a9(mdo): ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog myed pa nang du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don tu sman chen po 'chir gag gis na ba de dag thams cad nad yongs
207b1(mdo): su thar par 'gyur ba phob shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nad thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des
207b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig// de nas de sa thag tu bar snga pa las 'od rab tu btang ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
207b3(mdo): skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par gyur da te/ ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da to// 'di ltar sbyin pa
207b4(mdo): yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la stsogs pa rol mo swa
207b5(mdo): lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang bran po dang / bran mo dang chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sras dang / rta dang / la glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / khyim
207b6(mdo): dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yum 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brab 'khor dang / skyed mos tshal dang / yang to/ ka dang / khab pa brtsegs pa deng / kha bzangs dang / rta babs dang
207b7(mdo): skar zhung dang / bla kham lta bu dang / khri dang khyogs dang / gling bzhi pa dang / gling bcu drug pa nas/ rta cang shes stong gis drang ba dang ldan pa'i shing rtil bar gyi char ba bsnga las mngon par rab tu phab bo// de nas byang chub
207b8(mdo): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis rlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di dag longs byin cig/ yongs su gtang bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
207b9(mdo): yong su rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mazha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni phab na
208a1(mdo): de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i char phob shig des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gi rgyan gyi bsngags pa
208a2(mdo): ji snyed brjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa'i smra bar snang las byung ngo // de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang ji tsam phyogs bcu na/ sangs rgyas dang /
208a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda' dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar sdang las ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo // chos kyi sgo
208a4(mdo): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// de na tshad myed grangs myed pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
208a5(mdo): sdang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' shig na 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag ma'ang yod snyam mo// de nas byang
208a6(mdo): chub sems dpa' nam mtha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa 'akun tu snang ba'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes so// shes na sa kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras
208a7(mdo): so// rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu dri ma myed cing / shin tu dag pa'i lha'i myig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ji mthong ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpal kun tu snang bas
208a8(mdo): lha'i myig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bsdus na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed dpag tu myed pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa dang
208a9(mdo): chos kyi sgra thams cad zag pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi'i bde dag na yang/ ba cang ma lag kyang ma zhugs par 'di sa bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpal bu tu dang /
208b1(mdo): ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs grub pa de ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ ka lar cig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i
208b2(mdo): ra mngon par rab tu mabya'o// zhes ched du brjod pa 'di nyid du brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byangagab sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang
208b3(mdo): rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi rab tu 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mazha' mdzod kyis rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi cher gyi cho 'phrul 'di stan pas bgrang ba las
208b4(mdo): 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so// re nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud myed yugs mo lnga brgya byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der stong ste/
208b5(mdo): spags nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'ad da pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la yang khyod rtsol cig
208b6(mdo): de mas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin kye rlabs kyis bud myed de dag gi sngon gyi byol zha dog dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgya nam mkha' las babs nas
208b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpal nam mazha' mdzod kyis bud myed de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo dag bdag gi khyo ji lta ba bzhin du zhid cig/
208b8(mdo): de nas bud byed de dag gis ji lta bumar ba rang gyi khyo gang yin pa khring nas/ dka' mgul rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ ming bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis 'ag bdun du zung
208b9(mdo): rtsed reng 'ji sar blan byed pa ya bdag pa mardzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi sdog pa des des pa sbyin par byas so// nges bang byed lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa 'a' mdzod kyi yang du gnas rapa
209a1(mdo): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra// chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal// de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la de sbyin bgyis
209a2(mdo): chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo ba myed cing byed myed snga nas stong // zag myed ye shes bdag gis rab rtogs ste/ slan chad nyon mongs dbang du myi 'chi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni skyed par bgyi//
209a3(mdo): sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer bar bgyi// sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab// 'dren mchog thub pas/ de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus
209a4(mdo): na 'gyur// spyad pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag/ shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshe na myi lnga brgya bsad par chud de/ bsad du khrid pa las/ de dag gis bar snang las sems
209a5(mdo): can rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mazha' mdzod ces bya ba ga// nga 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis/ de la khyed cag phyag 'tshol cig dang bsad 'di las thar par
209a6(mdo): 'gyur ro zhes smra zhig thos so// de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas skad cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad smras so// tshig de skad
209a7(mdo): ces As ma thag tu skan cig de nyid la bar snabams kyi lnga brgyab bas te/ de lkugs nas gshengs kyi de dag sa 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag gis kyi dbul po 'di dag bsad de 'i rlung / bcag gi gos dang kyang
209a8(mdo): nams khyer la de cag gi srog cod de myi 'di dag khye shig/ de dag chags pas nos pa'i phyir bsad par chad pa'i gyi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag bsad do// de nas kyi de bsad pa las btang
209a9(mdo): ba de dag pas 'jigs zhing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' das mala' mdo ga la ba de dong ste/ lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamaso bos phyag 'tshal nas/ kyang
209b1(mdo): chub sems dpam ma mapa 'a mjogs sang zas mo sbyar te phyag 'ams nas 'disad ces gsol to// skyes bu ngas pa khyod kyis bdag can ma thog dang dbugs 'byi pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag cag chos gapa sa nas
209b2(mdo): tan du bgyis pas/ bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag rtsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rig kyi sa khyed cag tha na
209b3(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par
209b4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ brgya stongar ba'i ras bcos bu zung cig/ byin te/ grogs po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs
209b5(mdo): pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol to// de dag thams// cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na
209b6(mdo): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ phyi rigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'o de bzhin gshegs par 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'a ri'i bus/ bya
209b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' nam mtha' mdzod pa 'di skad kyis smras so// rigs kyis khyod kyis gang gyi skas kyi bar gyi rings pa'i rnam ma'a' mdzod pan gnas ji sring sor// nam mtha' mdzod kyis lAs pa/ bcu bsha ra'i
209b8(mdo): 'di zhes du mams/ cinas ma'a' skams pa 'am/ bang pa yod dang / rengs par 'gyur ra/ rigs kyi bu de lta bu ma yid do// smras pa/ btsud pa ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub de ri nam mkha' jobo nyid kyi
209b9(mdo): mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa brnams der bsngos pas/ debs nas mal la sa mdzod kyi rnams kyis gyi ngas/ sa khyod kyis rnamama' 'a mdzod panaganas rje ma mason nas zer ban/ losas rgya
210a1(mdo): chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems byed dpa'i srid lon/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnas tan sha ri'i bus
210a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam ma'a' mdzod kyis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu galate/
210a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag/ mchis kyis
210a4(mdo): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri 'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kha mas na/ gang ga'i klung gi bye mo ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdul
210a5(mdo): snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur da to// rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la/ de lta bur bgrang ba dang / mtshan ma bzhag pas de snyed kyi rdul phra mo
210a6(mdo): thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi ji snyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' na ma mkha' mdzod kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
210a7(mdo): de dag la zad pa yang myed do// sha ri'i bus gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das gag gi thad nas/ byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes brgya
210a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ yang sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi zhams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa
210a9(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa lba dang myi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
210b1(mdo): 'das smon lam thams cad las zhin du tu byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ mnga' ri'i bu de bzhim gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon trar bkod pa yod pa de dag ni tshe'i rdza
210b2(mdo): bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du gyur da te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'das
210b3(mdo): pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de'i dus na 'jig rten gi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po sa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de'i
210b4(mdo): bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa sum khri drug stong yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud myed kyi myong yang myed do// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal
210b5(mdo): pa stong phrag brgya thub po// de nas rgyal po lnga thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro byas te/ nyin cig la 'god pa yang ri ba bye ba
210b6(mdo): stong snyed kyi rin po che'i phung po de lta bus bsnyen bkur dpa rim 'gro bya sa so// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas/ bu'i gas dang / grong kyi myi rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang bcas te bla na
210b7(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sha ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khol los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lnga thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar rgya
210b8(mdo): blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ stong gsum ki 'khol los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lA thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom
210b9(mdo): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la
211a1(mdo): rab tu zhugs ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
211a2(mdo): nam mkha' mdzod 'dis gang ka'i klub kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim 'gro dang / sti snang byas te/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so// gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi byang
211a3(mdo): chub kyi sems yongs su dag pas/ bsam pa yongs su spyadas te/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs/ gangadaga' klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs
211a4(mdo): su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gu'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sgeg pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas/ na ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi
211a5(mdo): bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga/ 'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs
211a6(mdo): su dag pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyang sa/ gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
211a7(mdo): yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ kar ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam kata
211a8(mdo): gi pha rosad tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ thabs kyi pha rol tu
211a9(mdo): phyi nad pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams nA sa khong 'khro ba myed pa'i sems dang / thogs pa myed pa'i 'od gzer yongs su spyad
211b1(mdo): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la 'od khro ba myed pa'i sems dang / thogs pa myed pa'i 'od gzer yongs su dag pas/ byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang dka' ba chen
211b2(mdo): po dang btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ gangs 'i
211b3(mdo): krur gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du sbyar te skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs
211b4(mdo): dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du des gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas/ nam mkhamadzod 'di yongs su dag par/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mdzod 'di/
211b5(mdo): yongs su sbyangs so// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam ma/ kha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/ pa thams cad ston te/ sha ri'i bu ji ltar nam mazhal zad pa
211b6(mdo): myed pa bzhin du / rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas/ gang la yang zad pa myed do// de bas na' de nim mtha'i mdzod ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang
211b7(mdo): chub sems dpal ni longs spyod kyi zad pa dang / lakran rin po rtse dang / nam mkha'i mdzod kyi smon las yongs su bskung ba'i bzod pa skyes so// de nas kyang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des
211b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkhal mas chos bsgrag pa'i chos mnyan to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis spras pa/ de'i phyir rigs
211b9(mdo): bu bum pa dang bcam zhi zhe sa dang tham par 'dug la nama'i la 'di la gon par 'du ni su skyed cig dang / com mnya pa thams// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / 'khor de dag thams cad pas
212a1(mdo): mo sbyar nas/ nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mazha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams
212a2(mdo): kyi/ thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin// de la 'jug pa rab bstan gyis// khyed cag mthar kyis nyan par gyis// nam mkhal sa ni mtho ba myed// dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te// gang gi chos nyid mthon
212a3(mdo): dman myed// de la 'dud pa ga la yod// nam mkha' sa ni skye ba myed// 'gog pa dag kyang myi dmyigs so// ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la// de la rnam par 'jig pa myed// nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba myed//
212a4(mdo): gang ba dag kyang myi dmyigs so// chos rnams gang myed 'bri myed de// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// nam mkha' la ni mu na pa myed// de ni de yis ston myi spongs// sems kyi rang bzhin
212a5(mdo): 'od gsal bas/ de bas nams kyang ston spongs myed// nyi zla'i ni 'od gzer gyis// nam mkhal dga' bar myi 'gyur te// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang // gang la dga' bar 'gyur/
212a6(mdo): ba myed// mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' la ni ston spongs myed// de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis// rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon myi mongs// bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis// nam mtha' la
212a7(mdo): ni dga' 'gyur myed// rnyed dang sti stang thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dga' myi byed// bstod pa dang ni spod pa la// nam mkha' yongs su myi rtog ste// de bzhin pade dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems
212a8(mdo): dpa' brtan myi g.yo/ sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni// nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba byed// 'jig rten 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa myed// bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung
212a9(mdo): ban// de skar nam mkha' myi chog pa// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpal btan gyi gdung // skye ba myed cing 'dul ba 'ang byed// ji snya mdam la'a' gnas pa bzhin// chos
212b1(mdo): rnams 'od myed 'gro ba 'ang byed// chos kyi dbyings pa de dag gnas// gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// nam mkha' la ni thams cad 'byung // chos su snang ba ji snyed pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings las 'byung // mtshan ma
212b2(mdo): myed cing gzugs myed pa// nam mkha' ltar yod ma yin te// de skar sems rnams rab shes na// nam mkhal dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// mying tsam pa ni nam mkha' ste// de la kha dog dbyibs kyang byed/ sems dang
212b3(mdo): yid dang rnam zhes kyang // mying gis yongs su bstan pa'o// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' myed cing // thams cad du yang gzung du myed// de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang // ram mazha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs/ sems
212b4(mdo): can namagar 'gro mod kyi// de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang byed// sem sa cad byang chub phyir spyod kyang // de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma gyid// ji ste sngon gi mtha'i lus// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// de bzhin
212b5(mdo): phung po'i ngo bo nyid// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs// khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang // mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu// gsungs// 'di ltar bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'ang // nam mkha'
212b6(mdo): dang ni khams 'di mtshungs// de ltar sems can thams cad kyis// nams kyang yongs su gang myi nus// de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis rgya pa// sems kyi rgyud ni myi gang ngo // tshig chen seng ge'i sgra dag gis/
212b7(mdo): 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab kang // de dag bstan pa 'dis ngoms// ji skar nam mkhal su se bas/ mthal sa dmyigs par gyi 'gyur te/ de ba'i ma sangs rgyas chos rnams
212b8(mdo): kyang // mtha' ma dmyigs par myi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas chos// gang gis yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po bya 'jig cing // dngos po dag sa 'ang kyi gnas so// dngos dang dngos rtser ra
212b9(mdo): shes shing // yang dag mapa' la gang gnas pa// dngos po dang ni dngos byed par// sta ba mkhas pas kyi 'dzin to// bong pa nyid ni lA mos bsngags/ sbas stob pa nyid rkye re// de mi sgra myed brjod pa myed// de
213a1(mdo): phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du myed// gang de stong zhes bya ba yang // de'i don ni brjod du myed// sgyu ma smyig rgya rmyi lam dang // myig yor dang ni brag ca rnams//
213a2(mdo): de las stsogs pa bshad pa yis// 'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to// sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir// dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te// rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la// gnyen po rnams ni myi dmyigs so//
213a3(mdo): mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan// mtshan gzhi mtshan gzhi myed pa dag/ chos kyi dbyings la myi dmyigs so// mtshan gzhi nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' mtshan nyid
213a4(mdo): myed pa yin// gang gis tshul 'di rab rtogs pa// de dag bya// chub sems dpa' yin// chags pa myed cing bcings pa myed// shi na tu chung zad myed pa ste// spros myed spros dang bral ba ste// byang chub
213a5(mdo): sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can las ni de ma grol// se/ mas can la yang myi gnas shing // sems can rang bzhin ye shes kyi// sa// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya// sems can rab tu mya
213a6(mdo): ngan 'das// thos nas sdang bar myi byed de// gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo dag gi go ma 'di// sbru ma byed pas sems can dag/ mang du stsal nas der bsad kyang // de la bsad pa gang
213a7(mdo): yang myed// sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no// sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang // mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gcig/ rang bzhin rang bzhin myed par rtogs// nam mkha' las ni nem
213a8(mdo): mkha'i mdzod// myi zad pa'i mdzod grub ste// sems can thams cad mgu byed cing // mdzod de zad par myi 'gyur ro// tshad myed bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste// chos rnams la yang 'pho myed
213a9(mdo): pa// chos rnams chos nyid lta bar bya// rgyal rten te byung ba ni// chos rnams thams cad rab shes na// de'i mdzod ni myi zad de// chos kyi mdzod ni bsam myi khyab// chos bzhi 'di dag myi zad par// 'jig rten mgon pos rab
213b1(mdo): gsungs te// sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so// re ste de dag rdzas yin ma// de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi// de dag myed pas myi zad ces// de bas deni gyi zad gsungs
213b2(mdo): chos ni rab tu skad cig pa// zar pa'i chos ma myi zad de// byi zad de sa zad pa myed// de phyir myi zad pa zhes bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang rig gis// chos bstan 'di ni ba shes ma// des mi byang chub rnyed myi dkal/ bya
213b3(mdo): chub nyid la yang dag zhugs// tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba ma/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lnga'i bu nam mkha'i dkyil ma 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag
213b4(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa te/ 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcos
213b5(mdo): ldan 'das smra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyurd to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub se/ mas dpa' nam mkhal mdzod la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la lan
213b6(mdo): sngon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lta mo cam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sma 'di ga las byang snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par gyur pa to// nas
213b7(mdo): mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi sku 'di snyam du sems/ zag cha'i spug las byung // smras pa/ rigs kyi phu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las zag pa'i sku 'byung ngo // sbas pa rigs kyi bu zag cal sum sam/
213b8(mdo): sems sas// mthugams sa/ 'dog pas/ byims ga yang yod das// rnas pa/ rigs kyis der byed do// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin do// ji sa tha yongs su su chub kyang shA 'a 'o khor byed pa de banon du/
213b9(mdo): nam mal la yongs sum chub ste/ sgra dang skang go bar byed par myi 'gyur ro// klas pa/ rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa sa/ gsanas dbyangs 'di byung / smras pa rigs kyi bu ye shes kyis sor rnam par ris pa bam
214a1(mdo): 6/ gyis myi khyab ste/ kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsams pa de bar snang 'di las 'byung yang sems dang 'gro ba yang myed do// de 'dir 'ong ba yang myed mod kyi sgra'i sgra brnyan kyang 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu rten
